manzils.text: A wid iumnen! Eiifet deg iaahden nnwen. Eellen awen lmal n tejlibt, kkes ed wid i wen nnan. Ur awen teell ara uuyada, mara teuoem. Oebbi, s tidep, Ippameo ayen i S ihwan

A wid iumnen! Ur ssioxiset isekkiren n Oebbi, aggur ioqan, ieegga, snaoeq, wid iteddun ar Uxxam n Leaoam, saramen lfevl akked llza n Mass nnsen. Uegdet mi tfukkem. Xas tcuenem agdud i wen igedlen Loamaa n Leaoam, ur iwata ara a pzegrem tilas. Maawanet ar yise$ akked ueezzeb, ur ppemaawanet ar ubekkav akked lbe$wv. Eezzbet i Oebbi. S tidep, Oebbi Iwaao deg uaaqeb

I wen ipwagedlen d loifa, idim, aksum n yilef, wayen ipwamezlen i war Oebbi, ayen ippuxenqen, ayen i pwaueraan, ayen igrarben, ayen ippuberrzen, ayen icca lweec - siwa ma tessawvem tezlam t -, ieegga i tezoa, aseqdec n tseqqaot. Ayagi d ucmit. Assa, wid ijehlen uysen si ddin nnwen. Ur ten ppagwadet, agwadet iyI. Assa, Nnekmale$ awen ddin nnwen, Tame$ awen l$it iW, Ouva$ awen annuz d ddin. Win terra tmara di tegwnip n llae, ur iffi$ abrid, Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

A k steqsayen acu i sen ieellen. Ini: "ieell awen wayen imaanen. Ayen d teppawin s leweuc ipueggiden. Teseefvem asen ayen i wen Isseefev Oebbi. Eccet seg wayen i wen d iifen, mmektit ed fellas isem n Oebbi". Eezzbet i Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, Ip$awal deg uqeiii

Assa, ieell awen wayen imaanen. Ieell awen lqut n wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, - ieell asen lqut nnwen -; tilawin tieuoiyin iumnen, tilawin tieuoiyin seg wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, uqbel nnwen, ma tefkam asent tuccit nnsent; d uwqimen macci d ucmiten, ur teppeddum d temddukwal. Win iugin liman, mean igiten is. Neppa, di laxeot, seg imexsuoen

A wid iumnen! Ma tekkrem ar teallit, ssirdet udmawen nnwen, ifassen nnwen alamma d ti$wmao, saaddit ifassen illexsen $ef iqweooa nnwen, ssirdet ivaoen nnwen ar twelza. Ma tellam s loanaba, zzizdget. Ma tuvnem ne$ tunagem, ne$ iusa d yiwen segwen si ccicma, ne$ tennulem tilawin, ur tufim aman, ddmet akal zeddigen, saaddit ep $ef udmawen nnwen akked ifassen nnwen. Ur Ib$a ara Oebbi a kwen Iqelleq, maca Ib$a a kwen Izzizdeg, ad awen Itim l$it iS, amar a pesnemmrem
Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi, akked nnesba ikwen Inuseb, mi tennam: "nesla u nunez". Eezzbet i Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, Issen i illan deg idmaren
A wid iumnen! Illit d oosem ar Oebbi, d inagan at lmizan. Ur kwen issencaf dd$el n ugdud, ur twezznem. Wezznet. Lmizan iqoeb aias ar ueezzeb. Eezzbet i Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, Issen ayen txeddmem
Iaahed Oebbi ssmae akked warraz ameqwoaean, i wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan
Wid ijehlen u skaddben issekniyen nne£, widak d at ujajie
A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi, amek agdud ipheggi iman is, ad isaaddi afus is fellawen. Iiief akin ifassen nnsen, segwen. Eezzbet i Oebbi. £ef Oebbi ara ppeklen lmumnin

Ni$ Irra Oebbi laaqed i At Isoail. Nessuffe$ ed, segsen, mrawsin imvebboen. Inna Oebbi: "Nek yidwen ma teullem, tzekkam, tumnem s imazanen iW, u taawnem ten, toevlem i Oebbi aoeiial igerzen. War ccekk, ad awen Kkse$ tucmitin nnwen, a kwen Skecme$ di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Win ijehlen segwen, deffir waya, ni$ innetlaf seg ubrid umain

Imi ooan laaqed nnsen, Nexza ten, Nesgursel ulawen nnsen. Ssexsaoen inumak n wawalen, ppun amur n wayen i$ef pwafekkoen. Mazal a d temlilev d lexdaa nnsen, siwa drus segsen. Semmee asen u ssuref. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieemmel iaaoviyen
Wid iqqaoen: "nekwni d imasieiyen", Nerra laaqed yidsen, ppun amur n wayen i$ef pwafekkoen. Nessker ed, garasen, taadawt akked dd$el, ar ass n tnekra. Deqqal a ten Ixebbeo Oebbi $ef wayen la uenaan
A yAt Tezmamt! Ni$ iusa kwen id Umazan nne£. Ad awen ibeggen aias n wayen la teppeffrem, n Tezmamt. Ad Ipsemmie i waias. Ni$ tusa kwen id tafat s$uo Oebbi, akked Tezmamt ipbegginen
Inehhu yis Oebbi, ar iberdan n tifrat, wid ioe$ben llza S. A ten Issuffe$ si tillas ar tafat, s tsrie iS. A ten Inhu s abrid uwqim

Ni$ jehlen wid innan: "Oebbi, s tidep, d lmasie, mmi s n Meryem". Ini: "anwa isaan kra n lkwelf, s$uo Oebbi, ma ihwa yaS ad Ine$ lmasie, mmi s n Meryem, imma s, akked wayen akw illan di tmurt"? N Oebbi tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci

Udayen akked imasieiyen, nnan: "nekwni d tarwa n Oebbi, d wid Ismenyaf". Ini: "acimi, ihi, ikwen Ipaaqab $ef ibekkaven nnwen? Xaii, kunwi d imexlaq am wiyav". Ad Isemmee i win i S ihwan, ad Iaaqeb win i S ihwan. N Oebbi tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Taggara $uoeS

A yAt Tezmamt! Ni$ iusa kwen id Umazan nne£, ad awen ibeggen, mi taadda tallit war imazanen. Akka ur d teqqaoem ara: "ur a$ d iusi ubeccao, ne$ uneddao". Ihi, iusa kwen id ubeccao, uneddao. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Mi inna Musa i ugdud is: "a yagdud iw! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi. Irra segwen lambiyya, Irra kwen d igeldan. Ifka yawen ayen ur Ifki i yiwen, deg imavalen
A yagdud iw! Kecmet akal ioqan, i wen Iura Oebbi. Ur d ppu$alet $er deffir wen, a d tegwrim txesoem
Nnan: "a Musa! Degs agdud iaafriten, nekwni ur p nkeccem, d awez$i, alamma ff$en d segs. Mi d ff$en segs, a nekcem
Sin irgazen, seg wid iugaden - Isaad iten Oebbi -, nnan: "kecmet $uosen si tebburt; ma tkecmem, kunwi, ih, a prebeem. Ppeklet af Oebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Nnan: "a Musa! Nekwni ur p nkeccem, d awez$i, skud mazal iten degs. Oue, kecc d Mass ik, nna$et. Nekwni a neqqim dagi
Inna: "a Mass iw! Ay melke$, nek, siwa iman iw akked gma; ihi, Semfaoeq a$ d ugdud
Inna: "ihi, tamurt agi tepwagdel asen. Ukueet iseggwasen ad meniaoen di lberr. Ur $webben $ef ugdud iballa$en
Eeku yasen, s tidep, taquit n sin warrac n Adem, mi ieeggan i sin. S$uo yiwen tepwaqbel. S$uo wayev ur tepwaqbel ara. Inna: "war ccekk, a k n$e$". Inna: "Iqebbel kan Oebbi ieegga s$uo wid ipeezziben
Ma ibbwev iyi d ufus ik, ad iyi ten$ev, nek, ur k id ippawev ufus iw, a k n$e$. Nek, ppagwade$ Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Nek, b$i$ a ppawiv abekkav iw, akked ubekkav ik, a ppiliv seg wat tmes. Winna d aqeiii imednas
Iaazem, deg iman is, ad ine$ gma s, d$a in$a t. Igwra d seg imexsuoen
Iuzen ed Oebbi tagerfa, tkeooev akal, iwakken ad as tessenaat amek ara i$umm loeppa n gma s. Inna: "a ssexv iw! Ur bbwive$ ad ili$ am tgerfa yagi, ad $umme$ loeppa n gma". Igwra d seg wid inedmen

Ilmend n waya, Nura i At Isoail, ar win in$an amdan ur nen$i yiwen, ur nessefsed di tmurt, amzun in$a imdanen meooa. Win issadren yiwen, amzun issader imdanen meooa. Ni$ usan ten id imazanen nne£, s ubeggen. Sinna, deffir waya, s tidep, aias degsen ssuguten di tmurt

Aqeiii n wid ipna$en Oebbi akked Umazan iS, u ssenkaren asefsed di tmurt, siwa timen$iwt, ne$ asemmeo $ef umidag, ne$ anegzum ufus sya, uvao sya, ne$ anfay si tmurt. Ayagi, d aqeiii nnsen di ddunit. Di laxeot, fellasen aaaqeb ameqwoaean
Kkes ed wid inedmen, uqbel a pvebboem fellasen. Cfut ar Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
A wid iumnen! Eezzbet i Oebbi, nadit a pqeoobem $uoeS, nna$et deg ubrid iS, amar a prebeem
Ih, wid ijehlen, xas ad saun i illan akw di tmurt, rnu yas win i t icban, iwakken ad fdun, yis, iman nnsen seg uaaqeb, ass n tnekra, ur ipwaqbal segsen. Fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean
Ad b$un a d ff$en si tmes, ur llin d wid id iteff$en. Fellasen aaaqeb imezgi
Amakwar, tamakwart, gezmet asen ifassen nnsen, d aqeiii n wayen xedmen, d aaaqeb s$uo Oebbi. Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Win inedmen, deffir ddens is, u iu$al d aaovi, ad as Issuref Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Day ur teeoiv ara n Oebbi tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan? Ipaaqab win i S ihwan, Ipsemmie i win i S ihwan. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci

A Nnbi! Ur k $weblen wid ip$awalen ar tijehli, seg wid iqqaoen numen, s imawen nnsen, ur uminen wulawen nnsen, seg wudayen issemeasen i tikerkas, issemeasen i ugdud nniven, ur d nusi $uoek. Pbeddilen awalen deffir ussefhem nnsen. Qqaoen: "ma ippunefk awen d waya, ddemt ep; ma ur awen d ippunefk ara, $uowat"! Win Ib$a Oebbi a t Ihewwel, ur t tepsellikev, s wacemma, seg ufus n Oebbi. Widak, d wid iwumi ur Ib$a ara Oebbi, ad izdigen wulawen nnsen. Di ddunit ad pwaxzun. Di laxeot fellasen aaaqeb abarar
Wid issemeasen i tikerkas, iteppen leeoam, ma usan k id, fru garasen, ne$ eoo iten. Ma teooiv ten, ur k iiuooun s wacemma. Ma teuddev, eudd garasen s lmizan. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieemmel wid iweznen
Amek ara k id asen, s aeuddu, u nitni saan Tuoa, degs aeuddu n Oebbi? Sinna, deffir waya, ad wexxoen. Ur llin wigi si lmumnin

Ih, Nessers ed Tuoa, degs nnhaya akked tafat, ferrun yis ger wudayen, lambiyya imvuaen. U ioabaniyen akked lecyux seg wayen jemaen, si Tezmamt n Oebbi, u llan d inagan is. Ur ppagwadet imdanen, agwadet iyI. Ur d ppa$et, s issekniyen iW, ayen oxisen. Wid ur nepeuddu yara s wayen id Issers Oebbi, widak d ijehliyen

Nura yasen degs: ooue s ooue, tii s tii, anzaren s wanzaren, ameeeu$ s umeeeu$, tu$mest s tu$mest, leorue ad ppueesben. Win iooan, d le$oama s. Wid ur nepeuddu yara s wayen id Issers Oebbi, widak d imednas

Nuzen ed, deffir sen, Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, a d itebbet ayen it id izwaren di Tuoa. Nefka yas Linoil, degs nnhaya akked tafat, a d itebbet ayen it id izwaren di Tuoa. D nnhaya u d anabi i wid ipeezziben
At Linoil, iwata ad eudden s wayen id Issers, degs, Oebbi. Wid ur neudd ara s wayen id Issers Oebbi, widak d iballa$en

Nessers ak d Tazmamt, s tidep, a d tebbet ayen ip id izwaren n Tezmamt. Nvemn ip. Ihi, eudd garasen s wayen id Issers Oebbi. Ur teddu d lhawiyyat nnsen, beooa n wayen i k id iusan n tidep. I yal wa, Nefka lqanun akked ubrid. Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, yili Irra kwen d yiwen n lois. Maca, iwakken a kwen Ijeooeb $ef wayen i wen Ifka, mzizlet ar lxio. Ar Oebbi tu$alin nnwen akw. A kwen Ixebbeo $ef wayen tellam temgarradem

Eudd garasen s wayen id Issers Oebbi. Ur teddu d lhawiyyat nnsen. £uoek a k hewwlen $ef kra seg wayen i k d Issers Oebbi. Ma wexxoen, eeo ar Oebbi Ib$a kan a ten Iwwet $ef kra ibekkaven nnsen. Ih, aias n medden d iballa$en
Day b$an aeuddu n zzman n war tussna? Anwa yifen Oebbi d Ameaddi, i ugdud ineueen liman
A wid iumnen! Ur pparat, d iebiben, udayen akked imasieiyen. Garasen d iebiben. Win, segwen, i ten irran d iebiben, ad yili segsen. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Inehhu agdud imednas
A pwaliv imuvan n wul, ppazzalen $uosen, qqaoen asen: "nugad ay d itezzin fella$". Ahat a d Ias Oebbi s l$elb, ne$ s lameo s$uoeS. A d gwrin di nndama, $ef wayen ffren deg iman nnsen
A d inin wid iumnen: "day d wigi i iggullen s Oebbi, tagallit meqqwoen, ar nitni llan yidwen"? Mean igiten nnsen, gwran d d imexsuoen

A wid iumnen! Win segwen iooan ddin is…, ihi, deqqal Oebbi a d Iawi agdud Ieemmel, i T ieemmlen; ad oavin lmumnin, ad qeseen ar ijehliyen. Ad nna$en deg ubrid n Oebbi. Ur ppagwaden alummu n win iplummun. Ayagi d lfevl n Oebbi, Ippak it i win i S ihwan. Oebbi d Ajemmal, d Amusnaw
Imawlan nnwen siwa Oebbi akked Umazan iS, wid iumnen, wid ipeallan, pzekkin, u nitni iiinizen
Wid irran d imawlan nnsen, Oebbi, Amazan iS, akked wid iumnen…, ih, akabar n Oebbi, d nitni ara irebeen
A wid iumnen! Ur pparat d iebiben wid id ilhan, di ddin nnwen, s wurar d utihi, seg wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, uqbel nnwen, akw seg ijehliyen. Eezzbet i Oebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ma teddnem i teallit, fellas ad mmaalken, ad uraren. Ayagi, acku nitni d agdud ur nefhim
Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Acu i$ef la $ ttehmem, siwa imi numen s Oebbi, akked wayen id Issers $uone$, akked wayen id Issers uqbel? Tegwti degwen d iballa$en

Ini: "ad awen mle$ aqeiii n Oebbi icemten sennig wagi? Wid Ixza Oebbi, sserfan T, Irra ten d iddawen, d ilfawen". Aabden ioebbiten n tkerkas. Widak, atnan di lieala tucmip mavi, di ttelfan u$miq seg ubrid uuwib
Mi d usan $uowen, qqaoen: "numen". Ni$ kecmen d s tijehli, u nitni ff$en yis. Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen, ayen teffren
La tepwaliv aias, degsen, p$awalen ar ubekkav akked wanfal, teppen leeoam. I icmet wayen xeddmen
A lemmer i sen kksen ioabiyen akked lecyax, awal ubekkav akked wucci n leeoam? I icmet wayen la uenaen

Qqaoen wudayen: "iskkweo ufus n Oebbi". D ifassen nnsen i isekkwoen. Pwaxzan ilmend n wayen d qqaoen. Xaii! Ifassen iS llin, Ip$iti akken i S ihwa. Ayen i k d irsen, s$uo Mass ik, war ccekk, irennu i waias segsen, leb$wev akked tijehli. Nessker garasen cceena, akked dd$el, ar ass n tnekra. Yal tikelt ara caalen times i ioad, a p Issexsi Oebbi. Pnadin asefsed di tmurt. Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara ifessaden
At Tezmamt, lemmer day umnen u eezzben, yili, war ccekk, Nekkes asen tucmitin nnsen, u Nesskecm iten ar leonanat isaadiyen
Lemmer day iiifen di Tuoa akked Linoil, akked wayen i sen d irsen s$uo Mass nnsen, war ccekk, ad ccen sennig sen, akw seddaw ivaoen nnsen. Illa garasen lois ioeznen. Aias, degsen, dirit wayen xeddmen
A yAmazan, mel ayen i k d irsen, s$uo Mass ik. Ma ur t temliv ara, ur tessawvev ara tabrap iS. Oebbi a k Ifukk si l$aci. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Inehhu agdud ijehliyen

Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Ur tellim deg wacemma, alamma teddam d Tuoa, Linoil, akked wayen i wen d irsen, s$uo Mass nnwen". Ayen i k d irsen s$uo Mass ik, war ccekk, irennu, i waias segsen, leb$wev akked tijehli. Ur $webbel $ef ugdud ijehliyen
Ih, wid iumnen, udayen, iuabiyen, imasieiyen, wid iumnen s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Ni$ Nga laaqed i At Isoail, Nuzen asen imazanen. Yal tikelt ara ten id ias umazan s wayen ur asen nehwi, wa a t skiddben, wa a t n$en
£ilen ur ippili uhewwel. Dre$len, aaegen. Sinna, Issuref asen Oebbi. Sinna, aias degsen dre$len, aaegen. Oebbi Ipwali acu xeddmen

Ni$ jehlen wid iqqaoen: "Oebbi, s tidep, d lmasie, mmi s n Meryem". U inna lmasie: "a yAt Isoail! Aabdet Oebbi, Mass iw, d Mass nnwen". Ih, win icerken i Oebbi, Igdel as Oebbi Loennet. Axxam is d times. Ur llin isellaken i imednas
Ni$ jehlen wid iqqaoen: "Ih, Oebbi d wis krav n krav". Ur illi oebbi siwa Oebbi Yiwen. Ma ur xvin ara i wayen qqaoen, war ccekk, aaaqeb aqeoean ad ieaz wid ijehlen segsen
Day ur tuben ara ar Oebbi, u ssuturen aS ssmae? Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Lmasie, mmi s n Meryem, d amazan kan. Ni$ aaddan, uqbel is, imazanen. Imma s tessawal tidep. Llan teppen lqut. Wali amek i asen Nepbeggin issekniyen; sinna, wali amek la ppagwin
Ini: "day a ppaabdem, war Oebbi, ayen ur nezmir a kwen ivuoo, ne$ a kwen infaa"? Oebbi, Neppa, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Ur rennut, di ddin nnwen, ayen ur nelli d tidep. Ur teddut d lemcihwat n ugdud innetlafen zik, i itelfen aias, u telfen seg ubrid uuwib
Pwaxzan wid ijehlen, seg wAt Isoail, s$uo iles n Dawed akked Aisa, mmi s n Meryem; ayagi, $ef wayen auuan, u zgaren tilas
Ur ppemyekkasen ayen xedmen n dir. I icmet wayen xeddmen
A pwaliv aias segsen, ad xalven wid ijehlen. War ccekk, icmet wayen xedmen i iman nnsen. Ad Izaaf Oebbi fellasen. Nitni ad wekkoen deg uaaqeb
Lemmer uminen s Oebbi, Nnbi, akked wayen i sen d irsen, ur ten pparan d iebiben. Maca aias, segsen, d iballa$en

A ppafev icenga iqeueanen mavi, n wid iumnen, d udayen akked wid ipcaraken. A ppafev wid iqeoben mavi, s lmaenana, ar wid iumnen, d wid innan: "nekwni d imasieiyen". Ayagi, acku llan degsen ixelwiyen, ioehbaniyen, u nitni ur sme$woen ara iman nnsen
Ma slan i wayen id iusan ar Umazan, a pwaliv allen nnsen ccuoent d imeiii, seg wayen ufan n tidep. Qqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Numen, Aru ya$ seg inagan
Acu i $ iu$en ur numin s Oebbi akked wayen i $ d iusan n tidep; ur nessarem a $ Issekcem, Mass nne$, s agdud iaaoviyen
A ten Ioazi Oebbi, $ef wayen d qqaoen, s leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen. Wagi d aoazi n lauuam
Wid ijehlen, u skaddben issekniyen nne£, widak, d at Loahennama
A wid iumnen! Ur pgeddilet ayen imaanen i wen Ieell Oebbi. Ur zegret tilas. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid izegren tilas
Eccet seg wayen ikwen Ioeeq Oebbi, ieellen, imaanen. Eezzbet i Oebbi. YiS, kunwi, ay tumnem

Ur kwen Ipqassa Oebbi $ef tgallit n tkerkas. Maca, a kwen Iqiss $ef tgallit n uuee. Takweffaot is: a ppecceccem mraw ime$ban, akken tecceccam tawacult nnwen, ne$ a ten tesselsem, ne$ a psereem i wakli. Win ur nwaa ara, ad iueum krav wussan. D tagi ay d takweffaot n tgallit nnwen, ma teggullem. Eiifet di tgallit nnwen. Akka i wen d Ipbeggin Oebbi issekniyen, amar a ppesnemmrem
A wid iumnen! Ccoab, leqwmeo, tiaancuoin, taseqqaot, d ayen kan icemten, seg igi n Cciian. Ihi, veooeft asen, amar a prebeem
Ib$a kan Cciian ad isker ticenga akked dd$el garawen, s ccoab akked leqwmeo, a kwen iveooef seg usmekti n Oebbi, akked teallit. Day ur tepfukkum ara
A$et awal i Oebbi, a$et awal i Umazan. £uowat! Ma twexxoem, cfut ar Amazan, iwata yas kan anabi ipbegginen
Ur telli tiyta deg wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, $ef wayen ccan, ma eezzben, umnen, xedmen ayen ilhan, sinna eezzben, umnen, sinna, eezzben u maanen. Oebbi Ieemmel lauuam

A wid iumnen! War ccekk, a kwen Iweddeb Oebbi $ef wayen tepueggidem s ifassen nnwen, u s ixtucen nnwen, iwakken ad Ieeo Oebbi anwa i T ippagwaden, di tbavnit. Win izegren tilas, deffir waya, fellas aaaqeb aqeoean

A wid iumnen! Ur pueggidet di zzyaoa nnwen. Win iueggden segwen, u iaammed, aqeiii: ad iseddeq, si lmal is, ayen in$a s uuyada s, a d eudden, f waya, sin irgazen ieesbiyen segwen. D tikci ara iawven ar Lkaaba. Ne$ takweffaot: ad iccecc ime$ban, ne$, ayen iswan aya, ad iueum. Ad ijeooeb vveoo n lameo is. Oebbi Isemmee i wayen iaaddan. Win iu$alen a d Irr Oebbi segs ppao. Oebbi d Uzmir, Ippara d ppao
Teell awen uuyada n yill akked ucci s. D lqut i kunwi akw iminigen. Tepwagdel awen uuyada di tmurt, skud aql akwen d zziyyao. Eezzbet i Oebbi, $uoeS ara tepwafesrem
Irra Oebbi Lkaaba d axxam ioqan ipwabnan i l$aci, aggur ioqan, asfel, isenoaq, ayagi iwakken a ppeeoem ar Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg igenwan u di tmurt, u Oebbi Issen yal cci
Cfut iwaao uaaqeb n Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Amazan, iwata yas kan unabi. Oebbi Ieoa ayen temmalem u ayen teppeffrem
Ini: "ur iaadil ara wayen n dir akked wayen imaanen", xas teswehm ik lkwetoa n wayen n dir. Eezzbet i Oebbi, a yuaqilen, amar a prebeem
A wid iumnen! Ur steqsayet $ef t$awsiwin ara kwen icwe$ben, ma mlan awen tent. Ma testeqsam fellasent mara d iprusu Leqwoan, ad awen ppufessrent. Oebbi Isemmee aya. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ieellem
Ni$ isteqsa fellasent ugdud, uqbel nnwen. Sinna, segsent, gwran d d ijehliyen
Ur d Ifki Oebbi Baeioa, ne$ Sayba, ne$ Wauila, ne$ Eami. Maca, wid ijehlen gren d tikerkas $ef Oebbi. Tegwti degsen ur fhimen
Ma nnan asen: "yyaw ar wayen id Issers Oebbi, u ar Umazan". Qqaoen: "beoka ya$ ayen id nufa, $ef waya, $eo imezwura nne$". I ma imezwura nnsen ur ssinen acemma, ur pwanhan
A wid iumnen! Fellawen iman nnwen. Ur kwen iiiuoou win innetlafen, ma tepwanham. Ar Oebbi, tu$alin nnwen akw. A kwen Ixebbeo $ef wayen txeddmem

A wid iumnen! Ccada garawen, ma tusa d tmeppant ar yiwen segwen. Di lawan uweuui, sin irgazen ieesbiyen, segwen, ne$ wiyav war segwen, ma tellam d iminigen di tmurt, u tusa kwen id twa$it n tmeppant. A ten qesden deffir teallit. Ma tcukkem, sgallet pen s Oebbi: "ur d nesfayday syis, xas iaana llzem nne$, ur nteffer ccada n Oebbi, mulac, nekwni a nili seg imednab
Ma iveho ed fellasen denben, ad ppuneufen s wiyav, si loiha n wid vuooen imezwura. Ad ggalen s Oebbi: "ih, ccada nne$ tif ccada nnsen. Ur nzegger tilas, mulac, war ccekk, a nili seg imednas
Ppif akka iwakken a d awin ccada iwulmen, ad agwaden a ppili tgallit deffir tgallit nnsen. Eezzbet i Oebbi, ssemeesset, Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud iballa$en
Ass ideg ara Issemlil Oebbi imazanen, ad Yini: "acu i wen d jawben"? Ad inin: "ur telli tussna $uone$. D Kecc, s tidep, i Issnen tibavniyin

Mi Inna Oebbi: "a Aisa, mmi s n Meryem! Mmekti d i kwen £$ate$, kecc akked imma k, mi k Aiwne$ s ooue ioqan. Tepmmeslayev i medden si ddue, am unqaqoi. Mi k Slemde$ Tazmamt, uuwab, Tuoa, Linoil. Mi tuenaav, si talaxt, uuifa n ufrux, s– tsrie iW; tuuvev degs, tu$al d afoux, s– tsrie iW. Tesseelayev agugam, amuvin n lberu, s– tsrie iW. Mi tessenkarev lmeggtin, s– tsrie iW. Mi Sbaade$ fellak At Isoail, mi d tusiv $uosen, s ubeggen, u nnan wid ijehlen segsen: "ayagi iban d sseur kan
Mi Weeea$ i inmahalen: "amnet yissI, akw s umazan iW". Nnan: "numen. Echhed ar nekwni d imvuaen
Mi nnan inmahalen: "a Aisa, mmi s n Meryem! Ma Izmer Mass ik ad a$ d Issers lmaida seg igenni"? Inna: "eezzbet i Oebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Nnan: "neb$a a necc segs, a nevmen ulawen nne$, a neeo ar tenniv a$ d tidep, a nili d inagan iS
Inna Aisa, mmi s n Meryem: "a Oebbi, Mass nne$, Ssers a$ d lmaida, seg igenni, ad a$ tili d laid i umezwaru u i uneggaru nne$, u d assekni s $uoeK. £it a$ d. Kecc, Tifev akw im$iten
Inna Oebbi: "ad awen p id Sserse$. Win ijehlen segwen, deffir waya, a t Aaqbe$ aaaqeb ur Saadda$ i yiwen deg imavalen

Mi Inna Oebbi: "a Aisa, mmi s n Meryem! D kecc i innan i l$aci: erret a$, nek akked imma, d sin ioebbiten war Oebbi"? Inna: "gedha s yiseK! Ur iyi ippunefk ara a d ini$ ayen i$ef ur sai$ leeqq. Lemmer i t id nni$, yili Teeoiv t. Tesnev i illan deg iman iw, ur ssine$ ayen illan deg iman iK. Kecc, s tidep, d Amusnaw n tbavniyin
I asen nni$, siwa ayen iyi d Tumoev: aabdet Oebbi, Mass iw, u Mass nnwen. Lli$ d anagi nnsen, skud lli$ garasen. Mi iyi n Tessuliv $uoeK, d Kecc i ten id Iquoaan. Kecc, d Anagi n yal cci
Ma Taaqbev ten, ni$ d imdanen iK, ma Tsemmeev asen, Kecc, s tidep, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab

Inna Oebbi: "wagi d ass ideg ara stenfaan imawlan n tidep, si tidep nnsen. I nitni leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, ad wekkoen degsen, i lebda". Iouva ten Oebbi, u ouvan T, d wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean
N Oebbi tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan, akked wayen illan degsen. Neppa Izmer i yal cci
A neckeo Oebbi i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan. Irra tillas, tafat. Sinna, wid ijehlen pparan tanudda i Mass nnsen
Neppa, ikwen Ixelqen s talaxt, sinna, Iseyya lajel. £uoeS lajel ipwassnen. Deffir waya, kunwi la tepcukkum
Neppa, d Oebbi deg igenwan, di tmurt. Issen sser nnwen, d wayen d teqqaoem. Ieoa ayen tkesbem
Ur ten id ippas ussekni seg issekniyen n Mass nnsen, mebla ma ugin t
Ni$ skaddben tidep, mi ten id tusa. A ten id ias usali n wayen i$ef ttihin

Day ur walan ara aceal isuta, uqbel nnsen, ay Nekkes. Nesserked iten di tmurt akken ur kwen Nesserked. Nuzen asen aias ugeffur, Nerra yasen isaffen, ppazzalen seddawat sen. Nesnegr iten ilmend ibekkaven nnsen. Nxelq ed, deffir sen, sself nniven
Xas ad ak ed Nessers Tazmamt, di lka$ev, ara nnalen s ifassen nnsen, war ccekk, a d inin wid ijehlen: "wagi, s tidep, siwa sseur n uuee
Qqaoen: "a lemmer id irs $uoes lmelk". Lemmer a n Nessers lmelk, war ccekk, ad iuao lameo, sinna, ur pganin
Lemmer i t Nerri d lmelk, yili Nerra t d argaz, ad as Nessels ayen plusun
Ni$ mmaalken $ef imazanen, uqbel ik. Ayen i$ef ttihin, izzi i wid, segsen, immaalken
Ini: "ddut di tmurt, sinna walit amek tevoa d wid iskiddiben
Ini: "w i t ilan wayen akw illan di tmurt akked igenwan"? Ini: "d Oebbi". Iura, deg iman iS, aeunu. A kwen Issemlil i wass n tnekra, ur ccekk fellas. Wid isxesoen iman nnsen, ur ppamnen
IneS i ized$en deg iv, deg wass. Neppa Issel, d Amusnaw
Ini: "day ara sau$ bab, war Oebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan? Neppa Icceccay ur t cceccayen". Ini: "nek pwamoe$ d ad ili$ d amenzu ara ianzen. Ur ppilit seg imcurak
Ini: "nek ugade$, ma aaua$ Mass iw, aaaqeb n wass ameqwoaean
Win imenaan segs, assen, ni$ Ieun fellas. Wagi d rrebe n uuee
Ma Isaadda Oebbi fellak cedda, ur p itekkes yiwen, siwa Neppa. Ma Isrebe ik, Neppa Izmer i yal cci
D Neppa ay d Aqehhao, sennig imdanen iS; d Neppa ay d Bab n uuwab, i Ieoan

Ini: "anda p ccada sennig akw tiyav"? Ini: "Oebbi d Anagi gari yidwen. Iweeea yi d Leqwoan agi, iwakken a kwen nabi$ yis, kunwi akked wid u$uo ibbwev. Day, kunwi, war ccekk, a pcehhdem ar, ar tama n Oebbi, llan ioebbiten nniven"? Ini: "ur cehhde$"! Ini: "Neppa d Oebbi, siwa Yiwen. Nek, rri$ akin ayen tepcarakem
Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, ssnen p, akken ssnen arraw nnsen. Wid isxesoen iman nnsen, ihi, ur ppamnen
Anwa idensen sennig win d igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ iskaddben issekniyen iS? Ih, ur rebeen imednas
Ass ideg ara ten Nefser meooa, sinna a Nini i wid icurken: "anda ten icriken nnwen, i la taabdem
Deg uhewwel nnsen, siwa ma nnan d: "s Oebbi, Mass nne$, ur nelli d imcurak
Wali amek skaddben $ef yiman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen la d snulfuyen

Garasen wid i k issemeasen. Nerra aeurrim $ef ulawen nnsen, iwakken ur t fehmen. Tiaeeegt deg imeeeu$en nnsen. Ma walan yal assekni, ur ppamnen yis. Alamma, ma usan d $uoek, a k namren, ad ak inin wid ijehlen: ayagi siwa tiekayin imezwura
Siixxioen segs, iieooifen segs. Ay squccun siwa iman nnsen, ur faqen
Lemmer a ten twaliv, mara bedden ar tmes, a d inin: a ssexv nne$! Awi $ irran, ur neskiddib issekniyen n Mass nne$! A nili si lmumnin
Xaii! Iban asen d wayen teffren, zik. Lemmer a d kren, ad u$alen ar wayen i sen ipwagedlen. Nitni, s tidep, d ikeddaben
U qqaoen: "siwa tameddurt n ddunit i illan. Nekwni, ur fella$ tanekra
Lemmer a pwaliv mara bedden ar Mass nnsen, ad Yini: "ni$ ayagi s tidep"? A d inin: "ih, s Mass nne$"! Ad Yini: "ihi jeoobet aaaqeb, ilmend n wayen tejhilem

Ni$ xesoen wid iskaddben timlilit akked oOebbi. Alamma, ma iusa ten id yimir, deqzalla, a d inin: "a yamxix nne$, $ef wayen ideg nestehza"! Nitni ad bibben tiaakkwumin nnsen $ef izugar nnsen. I icmet wayen bubben
Tameddurt n ddunit d urar kan akked lhawiyya. Axxam aneggaru, war ccekk, yif ip i wid ipeezziben. Day ur tepmeyyizem ara
Ni$ Neeoa i$webben ik, s tidep, wayen qqaoen. Ihi, nitni ur k skiddiben. Maca imednas veggoen issekniyen n Oebbi
Ni$ skaddben imazanen uqbel ik. Ueboen $ef wayen i ten skaddben, akked wayen i ten meeenen, armi i ten id iusa usellek nne£. Ur illi ubeddel i wawalen n Oebbi. Ni$ usan k id, kra isallen imazanen
Ma eeay fellak uwexxeo nnsen, ma tzemoev a tessarmev aderbuz di tmurt, ne$ sellum s igenni, ad asen d tawiv assekni. Ma ihwa yaS i Oebbi, a ten Issemlil ar nnhaya. Ur ppili seg wid ur nessin
Siwa wid isellen, ara d ijawben. Lmegtin a ten id Issker Oebbi, sinna, $uoeS tu$alin nnsen
Qqaoen: "acimi ur as d irs ara ussekni s$uo Mass is"? Ini: "Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer a d Issers assekni", maca tegwti degsen ur eoin
Ur illi lweec di tmurt, ne$ ufrux ippafgen s wafriwen is, ur nelli d leoyus am kunwi. Ur Nestehza, di Tezmamt, $ef wacemma. Sinna, ar Mass nnsen, ad pwafessren
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, aaegen, gugmen, di tillas. Win i S ihwan i Oebbi, a t Itlef. Win i S ihwan, a t Iawi d ubrid uwqim
Ini: "twalam ma iusa kwen id uaaqeb n Oebbi, ne$ ma iusa kwen id yimir, day ar war Oebbi ara tnaaoem, ma tessawalem tidep
Xaii! £uoeS ara tnujem. Ad Issiferr ayen i$ef tnujem $uoeS, ma ihwa yaS, a ppeppum ayen tcurkem
Ni$ Nuzen ed ar leoyus, uqbel ik. Nesaadda fellasen tilufa, ccqa, amar ad eiwten
A lemmer eawten, mi ten id tusa tiyta nne£. Maca, qehoen wulawen nnsen. Cciian Icebbee asen ayen xeddmen
Mi ppun ayen i sen d smmektin, Nelli yasen tibbura n yal cci, armi, mi feoeen s wayen i sen ippunefken, Newwet iten, deqzalla. D$a qevaen layas
Pwakksen wid id igwran seg ugdud idensen. Ccekoan i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Ini: "twalam, ma Iddem awen Oebbi timesliwt nnwen, akked ieoi nnwen; ma Isle$ ulawen nnwen; anwa oebbi, war Oebbi, ar awen ten id iawin"? Wali amek Nessefham issekniyen, u nitni, sinna, zzin akin
Ini: "acu twalam, ma iusa kwen id uaaqeb n Oebbi, deqzalla, ne$ ainani? Day ara Ine$, siwa agdud imednas
Ur d Nuzen imazanen, siwa i ubecceo, d unabi. Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, a ten ieaz uaaqeb, ilmend n wayen be$wven

Ini: "ur awen qqare$ sai$ igerrujen n Oebbi, ur ssine$ tabavnit; ur awen qqare$: nek, d lmelk. Nek, teddu$ kan akked wayen iyi d ippuweeean". Ini: "day iaadel uder$al d win ipwalin? Day ur d tepmeyyizem ara
Nabi yis wid iugaden ad pwafessren ar Mass nnsen. Ur sain bab, war Neppa, ne$ amcafaa. Amar ad eezzben
Ur ppara wid ipnujun $uo Mass nnsen, tauebeit, tameddit, pnadin udem iS. Ur fellak a ten teasbev deg wacemma, ur fellasen a k easben, deg wacemma. Ma terriv ten, ihi, a ppiliv seg imednas
Akka ay Nhewwel kra s wiyav, iwakken a d inin: "day d wigi i I$at Oebbi, garane$"? Day ur Issin ara Oebbi, sennig akw, wid isnemmiren

Ma usan k id wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£, ini: "tifrat fellawen"! Mass nnwen Iura, i iman iS, aeunu. Ihi, i win, segwen, ixedmen tucmip, ur iaammed, sin akin, isteooaa, u ixdem ayen ilhan, Neppa Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Akka ay Nfeuuel issekniyen, iwakken a d iban ubrid ibe$wviyen
Ini: "nek, ippugdel iyi ad aabde$ wid u$uo la tepnujum, war Oebbi". Ini: "ur teddu$ d lemcihwat nnwen, mulac ad nnetlafe$, ur ppili$ seg wid ipwanhan
Ini: "nek, iife$ deg ubeggen n Mass iw. Teskaddbem t. Ur illi $uoi wayen u$uo tearem. Ih, aeuddu $eo Oebbi kan. Issawal tidep. Neppa Yif akw wid issenqaden
Ini: "lemmer illi $uoi wayen u$uo tearem, yili iuao lameo, gari yidwen". Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen imednas
£uoeS tisura n tbavnit. Siwa Neppa itent Issnen. Ieoa i illan di lberr, di yill. Ur i$elli ifer siwa ma Ieoa t. Akken aaqqa di tillas n tmurt, tizzegzewt, ta$eot, akw di tezmamt ipbegginen
D Neppa i wen ippaddamen leowae deg iv. Ieoa ay txeddmem, deg wass. Sinna, Ippara kwen id degs, iwakken ad ivou lajel ipwassnen. Sinna, $uoeS tu$alin nnwen, sinna, a kwen Ixebbeo $ef wayen txeddmem
D Neppa ay d Aqehhao sennig imdanen iS. Ippazen ed $uowen imearaben, alamma, ma tusa d tmeppant ar yiwen segwen, ad ddmen ooue is, imceggaen nne£. Nitni ur stehzayen
Sinna, ad u$alen ar Oebbi, Bab nnsen n tidep. Aeuddu, day macci d ayla S? Neppa Yif akw akken Ip$awal ar uqeiii
Ini: "anwa ara kwen Isellken si tillas n lberr d yill, u$uo tnujem s ueiwet akked tugwdi"? "Ma Isellek a$ si tagi, war ccekk, a nili seg wid isnemmiren
Ini: "Oebbi Isellek ikwen segs, akw si yal lhemm, sinna, kunwi la tepcarakem
Ini: "Neppa, Izmer ad awen d Iazen aaaqeb sennig wen, ne$ seddaw ivaoen nnwen. Ne$ a kwen Issemfaoaq, kra segwen ad jeooben leqheo n wiyav". Wali amek id Nemmal issekniyen, amar ad meeuen
Iskaddeb it ugdud ik, u neppa d tidep. Ini: "ur awen lli$ d awkil
Yal asali s lweqt is. A ppu$alem a ppeeoem
Ma twalav wid ipnamaren $ef issekniyen nne£, eoo iten, alamma bedlen anamer. Ma iseppu k Cciian, mi d temmektiv, ur p$imi d ugdud imednas
Ur isefk ara i wid ipeezziben, a ten easben deg wacemma. Maca d asmekti, amar ad eezzben

Eoo wid irran ddin nnsen d urar, d aqesseo. T$uoo iten tmeddurt n ddunit. Mmekti d yis, ard a ipwaiief umdan $ef wayen ikseb. Ur isai, war Oebbi, bab ne$ amcafaa. Yal le$oama ur tepwaqbal segs. Widak d wid ipwaifen $ef wayen kesben. I nitni tissit io$an, aaaqeb aqeoean, ilmend n wayen la jehlen

Ini: "day a naao, war Oebbi, ayen ur a$ neneffaa, ur a$ neiiuoou? U a nu$al a nwexxeo, deffir nnhaya n Oebbi, am win $ewwan ccwaien di tmurt, u ippueeyyeo". Pnecciden t imeddukwal ar nnhaya: "yya $uone$"! Ini: "d nnhaya n Oebbi, s tidep, ay d nnhaya. Nepwameo a nanez i Mass imavalen
eealet, eezzbet aS. £uoeS, Neppa, ara tepwafessrem
D Neppa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Ass ideg ara Yini: "ili"! Ad yili. Awal iS d tidep. IneS tagelda. Ass uuuvu n lbuq, Ieoa i iffren d wayen ivehoen. Neppa d Bab n uuwab, i Ieoan
Mi inna Iboahim i baba s, Azao: "day a pperrev tiaancuoin d ioebbiten? Nek wala$ k, kecc akked ugdud ik, di ttelfan n uuee
Akka, Nessken i Iboahim, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan, iwakken ad yili seg wid itebbten
Mi t i$umm yiv, iwala itri, inna: "wagi d Mass iw". Mi ixsi, inna: "ur eemle$ ara wid ixessin
Mi iwala iuli d waggur n tziri, inna: "wagi d Mass iw". Mi i$ab, inna: "ma ur iyi Inha ara Mass iw, ad ili$, war ccekk, seg ugdud im$eooqen
Mi iwala iiij ineqqeo ed, inna: "wagi d Mass iw, wagi meqqweo kteo". Mi i$li, inna: "a yagdud iw! Nek rri$ akkin ayen tepcarakem
Nek zzi$ udem iw ar Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, male$ ar tidep. Ur lli$, nek, seg imcurak
Ixuuem it ugdud is, inna: "day ad iyi txaumem $ef Oebbi? Ni$ Inha yi; ur ugade$ ayen i S tcurkem, siwa ma illa wayen i S ihwan i Mass iw. Tussna n Mass iw tezdi yal cci, day ur d tesmektayem ara
Amek ara ugade$ ayen tepcarakem, ur tugadem mi kunwi tepcarakem, i Oebbi, ayen iwumi ur d Issers adabu fellawen? Anwa, ger sin ikabaran, i iklalen laman, maday tessnem
Wid iumnen, ur sselsen ddens i liman nnsen, widak ad ilin di laman, u nitni pwanhan
D wagi ay d awal nne£. Nefka yas t i Iboahim, mgal agdud is. Nessalay tiseddaoin, win i£ £ ihwan. Ih, Mass ik d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Nefka yas Iseaq akked Yaaqub. I sin, Nenha ten. Nenha, zik, Nue akw, ger tarwa s, Dawed, Sliman, Yub, Yusef, Musa, Haoun, - Akka ay Nepkafi iaaoviyen
Zakarya, Yeeya, Aisa, Ilyas, - akw seg iaaoviyen
Ismaail, Lyasaa, Yunes, Lui, - akw Nesmenyaf iten $ef imavalen
akw seg ibabaten nnsen, si tarwa nnsen, akked watmaten nnsen. Nefren iten, u Nebbwi ten d ubrid uwqim
Tagi d nnhaya n Oebbi. Inehhu yis win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Lemmer curken, war ccekk, ad asen imeu wayen xeddmen
D wigi iwumi d Nebbwi Tazmamt, uuwab, akked lambiyya. Ma jehlen widak yis, ihi, Nekwni Nwekkel ip i ugdud ur njehhel yis
Wigi d wid Inha Oebbi. Ddu d nnhaya nnsen. Ini: "ur awen suture$, fellas, taqdiat. Neppa d asmekti kan i imavalen

Ur qudoen Oebbi azal n lqedo iS, mi qqaoen: "ur d Issers Oebbi acemma ar umdan". Ini: "anwa id Issersen Tazmamt, id ibbwi Musa, d tafat u d nnhaya i medden? Tepparam p di lkwa$ev i tesskanem. Aias ay teppeffrem. Tlemdem ayen ur tessinem, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen". Ini: "D Oebbi". Sinna, anef asen ad uraren s nnmara nnsen
Tagi d Tazmamt, Nessers ip id teoqa, a ptebbet ayen ip id izwaren, a ppendeo tayimmap n temdinin akked wayen i s d izzin. Wid iumnen s laxeot, umnen yis. Nitni bedden i teilla nnsen

Anwa idensen sennig win d igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi? Ne$ inna: "ppuweeea$ d", ur as d ippuweeea wacemma? U win innan: "a d sserse$ am wayen id Issers Oebbi"? Lemmer a pwaliv imednas, di maylellif n tmeppant, u lmalayek elent ed ifassen nnsent: "ssuff$et ed tiowiein nnwen. Assa, a ppeppuqeiiim s uaaqeb isneecamen, ilmend n wayen teqqaoem $ef Oebbi, ur d tidep. U tellam tessem$waoem iman nnwen, $ef issekniyen iS

Ni$ tusam a£ d, d ifoiden, akken ikwen Nexleq abrid amezwaru. Teooam deffir wen, ayen i wen Nefka. Ur Nwala, $uowen, imcafaen nnwen, wid i taabdem, nitni, d icriken nnwen. Ni$ temfaoaqem, u ooan kwen wid la taabdem
Oebbi, s tidep, Ifeooec aaqqa, i$es. Issuffu$ ed amuddir si lmegget. Issuffu$ ed lmegget seg umuddir. Akka ay d Oebbi. Acimi tugim
Issenkar tafrara. Irra iv i ureyyee, iiij d waggur i leesab. D wagi ay d aseyyi n Uzmir, Amusnaw
D Neppa i wen Irran itran, ad awen mlen abrid, di tillas n lberr akked yill. Ni$ Nemmal issekniyen i ugdud issnen
D Neppa ikwen id Ixelqen si yiman afoid, sinna: amkan, tarusi. Ni$ Nemmal issekniyen i ugdud ifehhmen

D Neppa id Isrusun aman seg igenni. Nessuffu$ ed yissen yal im$an. Nessuffu$ ed yissen tizzegzewt. Nessuffu$ ed yissen iaaqqayen mbabben, iguza n ppmeo id ipuubbun si tezdayin, leonanat n tfeooant, uzemmur, n oemman, ppemcabin ne$ ur ppemcabin. Walit ppemoa nnsen mi d teffe$ tebbwa. Ih, deg waya, war ccekk, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Rran i Oebbi, leonun d icriken, u Ixelq iten. Snulfan aS d arrac, tullas, ur eoin. Gedha s yiS! Ay Aalay sennig wayen d qqaoen
Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, amek ara Isau mmi S, ur Isai tameddakwelt? U Ixleq yal cci, u Neppa, yal cci, Issen it
D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Ixleq yal cci, ihi aabdet eP. Neppa d Awkil n yal cci
Ur T tepsami tmu$li. Neppa Ipsami tamu$li. Neppa d Laiif, i Izoan
Ni$ iusa kwen id ara twalim, s$uo Mass nnwen. Win iwalan, i iman is; win idre$len, mgal is. Ur lli$ nek d ameareb nnwen
Akka ay Nessefham issekniyen, iwakken ad inin: "tlemdev", iwakken a t Nbeggen i ugdud issnen
Ddu d wayen ik ed ippuweeean, s$uo Mass ik; ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Eoo imcurak
Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, ur curken. Ur k Nerra d ameareb nnsen, ur telliv d awkil nnsen
Ur naalet wid u$uo la pnujun, war Oebbi. Axaieo ad naalen Oebbi, s lbe$wv, war tamusni. Akka ay Ncebbee igiten is i yal lois. Sinna, ar Mass nnsen, tu$alin nnsen; a ten Ixebbeo $ef wayen xeddmen
Ggulen s Oebbi, tagalit meqqwoen, ar ma iusa ten id ussekni, ar ad amnen yis. Ini: "issekniyen ar Oebbi kan". Acu i kwen irran teussem ar, xas ma iusa ten id, ur ppamnen
A Neppi ulawen nnsen, d yieoi nnsen, akken ur uminen yis abrid amezwaru. A ten Neoo di lbe$wv nnsen, d ider$alen
Xas Nekwni Nessers asen d lmalayek, u mmeslayen asen d lmeggtin, u Nefser asen d, yal cci, zdat sen, ur ppamnen, siwa ma ihwa yaS i Oebbi. Maca, aias degsen ur ssinen
Akka ay Nerra, i yal nnbi, acengu. Ccwaien, seg imdanen akw si leonun, ppemweeein garasen awal uziyn i u$uoou. Lemmer i S ihwi, i Mass ik, ur p xeddmen. Ihi, eoo iten ar wayen d snulfuyen
iwakken ad mmalen $uoes ulawen n wid ur numin s laxeot, a t oavin, ad gemren ayen zeraen
Day b$i$ ameaddi, war Oebbi? D Neppa i wen d Issersen Tazmamt, s ussefhem. Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, eoan, ar neppat, ters ed s$uo Mass ik, s tidep. Ur ppili seg wid ipcukkun
Awal n Mass ik ibbwev, s tidep akked lmizan. Ur illi ubeddel deg wawal iS. Neppa Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma tu$ev awal i tegwti n wid illan di tmurt, a k telfen seg ubrid n Oebbi. Teddun kan d wayen nwan. Nitni snulfuyen d kan
Ih, Mass ik Issen sennig akw, anwi innetlafen seg ubrid iS. Neppa Issen sennig akw, anwi ipwanhan
Eccet ayen i$ef d immekti isem n Oebbi, ma tumnem s issekniyen iS

Acu ikwen iu$en, ur teppeppem ara seg wayen i$ef d immekti isem n Oebbi? Ni$ Issfehm awen ayen i wen Igdel, siwa ma ipwaeeppem fellawen. Ih, aias ay tellifen, s zzhu nnsen, war tussna. Ni$ Mass ik Iugar akw akken Issen wid izegren tilas
Ekkset abekkav uvhio akked uffir. Ih, wid ibbwin abekkav, ad ppuqeiiin $ef wayen xeddmen
Ur teppet ayen i$ef ur d immekti ara, isem n Oebbi. Ih, ayagi d ixmio. Ih, ccwaien pweeein i imeddukwal nnsen, a kwen namren. Ma tu$em asen awal, kunwi, s tidep, tcurkem
Ma win illan d lmegget, Nessider it id, Nga yas tafat, iteddu yis ger medden, day d amedya s, win illan di tillas, ur izmir ad iffe$ segsent. Akka, ippucebbee i ijehliyen, wayen xeddmen
Akka ay Nerra, ad ppandin di yal tamdint, ibe$wviyen is, uqsieen mavi. Ppandin kan i iman nnsen, ur faqen

Ma iusa ten id ussekni, ad inin: "ur neppamen, alamma iusa ya$ d ayen id iusan ar imazanen n Oebbi". Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen, anida ara Ifk taboap iS. Ad ioxisen, ar Oebbi, wid ibe$wven. Fellasen aaaqeb uqsie, ilmend n wayen ppandin
Win Ib$a Oebbi a t Inhu, ad illi idmaren is ar wannuz. Win Ib$a a t Itlef, ad Irr idmaren is deyqen, teeyyoen, amzun ippaaoav ad iali s igenni. Akka i Ippara Oebbi axerwaa i wid ur numin
Wagi d abrid uwqim n Mass ik. Ni$ Nessefham issekniyen i ugdud ismektayen
I nitni, axxam n tifrat ar Mass nnsen. Neppa d Bab nnsen, $ef wayen xeddmen

Ass ideg ara ten Ifser meooa: "a yagraw n leonun, ni$ tcerraem deg imdanen"? A d inin imawlan nnsen, seg imdanen: "a Mass nne$! Kra segne$ $elten si kra, Nebbwev ar lajel nne$, i $ Terriv". Inna: "d times ay d tanezdu$t nnwen, ad degs twekkoem, siwa ma ur aS ihwi i Oebbi". Ih, Mass ik d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Akka ay Neppara kra imednas d iebiben n kra, ilmend n wayen keppben

A yagraw n leonun d yimdanen, day ur kwen id usan ara imazanen segwen? Mmalen awen issekniyen iW, nedoen kwen $ef temlilit n wass nnwen agi". Nnan d: "ncehhed $ef yiman nne$". T$uoo iten tmeddurt n ddunit. Cehhden $ef yiman nnsen ar nitni, s tidep, llan d ijehliyen
Akka, acku Mass ik ur Isquccu tamdint, s ddens, ma llan imezda$ is d i$wefliyen
I yal yiwen, tiseddarin seg wayen ixdem. Ur I$effel Mass ik $ef wayen xeddmen
Mass ik d Asaay, d Bab ueunu. Ma ihwa yaS a kwen Ikkes, a d Inuef, deffir wen, ayen i S ihwan, akken ikwen id Ixleq si tarwa n ugdud nniven
Ih, ayen i wen ippuaahden, a d ias, war ccekk. Ur tezmirem, kunwi, a ppesfunngem
Ini: "a yagdud iw! Xedmet akken tewaam, nek ad xedme$. Deqqal a ppeeoem iwumi ara telhu taggara n Uxxam". S tidep, ur rebeen imednas

Gan aS i Oebbi amur, seg wayen id Ifka n l$ella, akked lmal. Nnan: "wagi i Oebbi –- di tikta nnsen -, wagi i icriken nne$". Ayen gan i icriken nnsen, ur ippawev ar Oebbi. Ayen gan i Oebbi, neppa, ad yawev ar icriken nnsen. I icmet wayen id peuddun
Akka ay cebbeen icriken nnsen, i waias n yimcurak, timen$iwt n tarwa nnsen, iwakken a ten squccen, u ad irwi ddin nnsen, fellasen. Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, ur p xeddmen. Eoo iten ar wayen d snulfuyen

Nnan: "lmal akked l$ella yagi ppugedlen, ur ten itepp, siwa win i $ ihwan". S tikta nnsen. Lmal iwumi gedlen iarar nnsen, lmal iwumi ur d ppadren fellasen, isem n Oebbi. D asnulfu mgal iS. A ten Iqeiii $ef wayen d snulfuyen
Qqaoen: "ayen illan deg iaabbav n lmal agi, i ddker nne$ kan, ipwagdel i tlawin nne$". Ma ilul ed immut, ad mlilen $uoes. A ten Iqeiii $ef wayen d qqaoen. Neppa, s tidep, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ni$ xesoen wid in$an arraw nnsen. D tiderwect, war tussna. Gedlen ayen i s iten I$at Oebbi, snulfan d mgal Oebbi. Ni$ nnetlafen, ur pwanhan

D Neppa id Ixelqen leonanat s iaricen, ne$ war iaricen, tizdayin, zerriaa n yal uuenf, i wucci; azemmur akked rreman ippemcabin, ne$ ur neppemcabi. Eccet si ppemoa nnsen, ma fkan d, efket leeqq is, ass u$ellet nnsen. Ur ssugutet. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid ipeawalen
Si lmal, aggway d wussu. Eccet seg wayen ikwen Ioeeq Oebbi. Ur teddut d iberdan n Cciian. Neppa, s tidep, d acengu nnwen n uuee
Iamt tyugiwin, snat u$welmi, snat umaiz. Ini: "d sin n ddker i Igdel, ne$ d snat n nnta, ne$ d ayen illan deg iaabbav n snat n nnta? Xebboet iyi d, s tussna, ma tessawalem tidep

Seg ile$wman, snat, seg ubeqoi, snat. Ini: "d sin n ddker i Igdel, ne$ d snat n nnta, ne$ d ayen illan deg iaabbav n snat n nnta, ne$ tellam d inagan mi kwen id Iweuua Oebbi $ef waya"? Anwa idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, iwakken ad itlef imdanen, ur issin. Ih, Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas

Ini: "ur ufi$ ipwagdel a t icc yiwen, deg wayen iyi d ippuweeean, siwa ma illa d loifa, ne$ d idim immaren, ne$ d aksum n yilef - wagi, war ccekk, d lewsex -, ne$ ieegga s d$wel i war Oebbi. Win i$ef ippueeppem, ur ib$i, ur ib$wiv, Mass ik, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

I wudayen, Negdel ayen akw isaan acaren, seg ubeqoi akked u$welmi, Negdel asen tassemt nnsen, siwa tin n iarar nnsen, iaabbav, akked wayen ipwaxelven akked i$san. Akka ay ten Nepkafi, ilmend n iieoo nnsen. Nekwni, war ccekk, d At Tidep
Ma skaddben k, ini: "Mass nnwen d Bab ueunu iwsaan, ur ipwexxio ssexv iS, af ugdud ibe$wviyen

Ad inin imcurak: "lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, nekwni akked imezwura nne$, ur ncurek, ur negdel acemma". Akka ay skaddben imezwura nnsen, armi jeooben ssexv nne£. Ini: "day tesaam tussna ar a$ d tesseknem? Teppeddum kan d nnwaya, kunwi tesnulfuyem d kan
Ini: "n Oebbi timenna tunuiein. Lemmer i S ihwi, yili Inha kwen akw

Ini: "awit ed inagan nnwen, ara icehhden ar Oebbi Igdel ayagi". Ma cehhden, ur cehhed yidsen. Ur teddu d lhawiyya n wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, akked wid ur numin s laxeot, u pparan tanudda i Mass nnsen

Ini: "yyaw, ad ini$. I wen Igdel Mass nnwen: ur aS tepcarakem acemma; elhut ar imawlan nnwen; ur neqqet tarwa nnwen, di tigullelt - d Nekwni ara kwen Ioeeqen yidsen -, ur ppaeet ar laao, d uvhio ne$ d uffir; ur neqqet amdan, d ayen Igdel Oebbi, siwa ma s leeqq". Ar waya i kwen Iweuua, amar a pfehmem

Ur pqeooibet s ayla ugujil, siwa s wayen ilhan, alamma immeetel. Weznet, ktilet s lewqama. Ur Nepkellif amdan siwa ar wayen iwumi izmer. Ma thedoem d, weznet, xas ma $eo llzem nnwen. Qadoet lemaahda n Oebbi. Iweuua kwen $ef waya, amar a d temmektim
D wagi ay d abrid iW uwqim, ddut degs. Ur teddut d iberdan ara kwen isiixoen seg ubrid iS. Iweuua kwen $ef waya, amar a peezzbem
Sinna, Nefka Tazmamt i Musa. Tewqem i wid imaanen, tfeuuel yal cci, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Amar ad amnen s timlilit n Mass nnsen
Tagi d Tazmamt, Nessers ip id, teoqa. Ihi, ddut yides, eezzbet, amar fellawen aeunu
Ur d teqqaoem ara: "ters ed kan Tezmamt $eo sin leoyus, uqbel nne$, ur neeoi d acu sselmaden

Ne$ a d tinim: "lemmer id ters Tazmamt $uone$, yili nif iten akken nepwanha". Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen, s$uo Mass nnwen, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Anwa idensen sennig win iskaddben issekniyen n Oebbi, u iooa iten? A Nqeiii wid iooan issekniyen nne£, s yir aaaqeb, ilmend n wayen la ppaooan

D acu poaoun, siwa ma ten id asent lmalayek, ne$ a d Ias Mass ik, ne$ a d asen kra issekniyen n Mass ik? Ass ideg ara d asen kra issekniyen n Mass ik, ur infaa umdan liman is, ma, iu$ leal, ur iumin ara, ne$ ur iksib lxio, di liman is. Ini: "gganit, nekwni, ih, la nepgani
Ih, wid ibvan ddin nnsen, u gan ikabaren, ur tepkkiv yidsen deg wacemma. Lameo nnsen ar Oebbi kan, sinna, a ten Ixebbeo $ef wayen xeddmen
Win id iusan s yise$, ines mraw i t icban; win id iusan s tucmip, ad ippuqeiii s tin kan i p icban; nitni ur pwadensen
Ini: "nek, Inha iyi Mass iw, ar ubrid uwqim, d ddin n ddwam, win n Iboahim, i imalen ar tidep, ur nelli seg imcurak
Ini: "ih, taeallit iw, iseflan iw, tudert iw, tameppant iw, i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Ur aS illi ucarek. Pwamoe$ d s waya: nek d amdua amenzu

Ini: "day b$i$ mass, war Oebbi? U Neppa d Mass n yal cci". Ur ikesseb yal yiman, siwa mgal is. Ur ipbibbi win ibubben taakkwemt n wayev. Sinna, ar Mass nnwen, tu$alin nnwen. Sinna, a kwen Ixebbeo $ef wayen tellam temgaradem
D Neppa i kwen Irran d igensas di tmurt. Irra, kra segwen, tiseddaoin sennig wiyav, iwakken a kwen Ijeooeb $ef wayen i wen Ifka. Ih, Mass ik Ip$awal deg uaaqeb. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Almu
Tazmamt ters ed $uoek, ur teppili segs lhejna deg idmaren ik, iwakken a pnabiv yis; u d asmekti i lmumnin
Ddut d wayen id irsen $uowen, s$uo Mass nnwen. Ur teddut d imawlan, war Neppa. Drus id tesmektayem
Aceal n temdinin ay Nessenger. Tusa ten id tiyta nne£, deg ives nnsen, ne$ deg uqeggel nnsen
Ti$oi nnsen, mi ten id tusa tiyta nne£, siwa mi d nnan: "ih, nella d imednas
War ccekk, a Nesteqsi wid u$uo id Nuzen, a Nesteqsi imazanen
War ccekk, ad asen Neeku, s tmusni, ur Nelli N$ab
Awzan, assen, d tidep. Wid iwumi eeayet lweznat nnsen, widak d wid irebeen
Wid iwumi fessuset lweznat nnsen, widak d wid ixesoen iman nnsen, seg akken sednasen issekniyen nne£
Ni$, s tidep, Nesrekd ikwen di tmurt, Nerra yawen, degs, tamaict nnwen. Drus ay tesnemmirem
Ni$, s tidep, Nxelq ikwen, sinna, Nmesl ikwen, sinna, Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem"! Knant, siwa Iblis. Ur illi seg wid iknan
Inna: "acu k iiifen ur tekniv ara, mi k d Umoe$"? Inna d: "Nek, ife$ t. Txelqev iyi si tmes, Txelqev t si talaxt
Inna: "ihi, uuub segs! Ur ak ippunefk ara a ppesme$woev iman ik, degs. Effe$, kecc seg wid ixuuen
Inna: "Eoo iyi, ar ass ideg ara d kkren
Inna: "kecc, ih, seg wid ara iqqimen
Inna d: "imi iyi Taammdev a$ewwu, ad asen qqime$, war ccekk, deg ubrid iK uwqim
Sinna, ad asen d tekke$ zdat, deffir, yeffus, zelmev. Ur Teppafev, $eo tugwti segsen, asnemmer
Inna: "effe$ segs, d ameequo ippuvegoen! War ccekk, ad Acaoe$ Loahennama s wid, segsen, i k ivefoen, akked yiswen akw
A Adem, ezde$ Loennet, kecc akked tmeiiut ik, eccet seg wayen i wen ihwan. Ur pqeooibet ttejoa agi, mulac a ppilim seg imednas
I$ewwa ten Cciian, iwakken ad asen d iban aaryan nnsen i illan iffer. Inna: "Ikkes awen, kan, Mass nnwen, ttejoa agi, iwakken ur teppilim d lmalayek, ne$ ur tepwekkioem
Iggul asen: "nek, i kunwi, d unuie

Isdull iten s u$uoou. Mi aaoven si ttejoa nni, walan iman nnsen aaran. Lhan d la pcuddun, $ef iman nnsen, afriwen n Loennet. Issawel asen d Mass nnsen: "day ur awen Gdile$ ara ttejoa nni? Ad awen Ini$: war ccekk, Cciian, i kunwi, d acengu n uuee
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Nvuoo iman nne$. Ma ur a$ Tsemmeev, ur Teunev fella$, a nili seg imexsuoen
Inna: "erset! Kra d icenga n kra. A pzed$em di tmurt, a ppezhum, tallit kan
Irna: "degs a ppidirem, degs a ppemmtem, segs a d teff$em
A tarwa n Adem! Ni$ Nessers awen ed aceiiiv ara kwen issoen, ooeue, akked uceiiiv ueezzeb. Wagi yif iten". Ayagi seg issekniyen n Oebbi, amar a d mmektin

A tarwa n Adem! £uowat a kwen ihewwel Cciian, akken id issuffe$ imezwura nnwen si Loennet! Ikkes asen iceiiiven nnsen, iwakken ad asen issken aaryan nnsen. Neppa, war ccekk, ipwali kwen - neppa akked ccetla s - seg wanda ur ten tepwalim. Ni$ Nerra ccwaien d imawlan n wid ur numin
Mi xedmen ayen n dir, ad inin: "nufa d akka ar imezwura nne$, u Oebbi Iumeo a$ d $uoes. Ini: "Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ippameo ar wayen n dir. Day a d tinim $ef Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Ini: "Iumeo ed Oebbi lmizan. Zzit $uoeS udmawen nnwen di yal lekni, nujet $uoeS. £uoeS, s ddin iufan. Akken ikwen id Ixleq, a ppu$alem
Arbaa Inha it, arbaa iura ttelfan fellas. Nitni, s tidep, rran ccwaien d iebiben, war Oebbi. U $ilen nitni, war ccekk, pwanhan
A tarwa n Adem! Ccebeet i yal lekni, eccet, esswet, ur siuqqutet. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid isiuqquten

Ini: "anwa i igedlen ccbaea n Oebbi, id Issuffe$ i imdanen iS, akked ooeeq ilhan"? Ini: "ayagi, di tmeddurt n ddunit, i wid iumnen. I nitni kan ass n tnekra". Akka ay Nfeuuel issekniyen i ugdud issnen
Ini: "Mass iw Igdel kan ayen n dir, d uvhio ne$ d uffir, abekkav, tem$weo war ssebba, a pcarkem i Oebbi ayen iwumi ur d irs udabu, a ppinim $ef Oebbi ayen ur tessinem
Yal lois isaa lajel. Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ur t swexxioen s ssaaa, ur t id eeaean
A tarwa n Adem! Ma usan kwen id imazanen segwen, mmalen awen issekniyen iW, wid ipeezziben, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, u sme$woen iman nnsen fellasen, widak d at tmes, nitni degs ad wekkoen

Anwa idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ iskaddben issekniyen iS? Widak, a ten ieaz umur i sen iuran di Tezmamt. Alamma, mi ten id usan imceggaen nne£, ad ddmen leowae nnsen, ad inin: "anida ten wid u$uo tepnujum, war Oebbi"? A d inin: "ur ten nufi". Ad cehhden, $ef yiman nnsen, ar nitni llan d ijehliyen

Inna: "kecmet di tmes ar leoyus n leonun akked yimdanen, i kwen id izwaren"! Yal tikelt ara ikcem lois, ad ixzu gma s. Alamma, mi mlalen degs akw, ad yini uneggaru nnsen $ef umezwaru nnsen: "a Mass nne$! Wigi telfen a$, Aaqeb iten s tmes, berdayen". Inna: "i yal yiwen berdayen, maca ur teeoim ara
Inna umezwaru nnsen i uneggaru nnsen: "ur kwen smenyafen i nekwni, ihi jeoobet aaaqeb, ilmend n wayen tkeppbem
Ih, wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, u sme$woen iman nnsen fellasen, ur asen tellin tibbura igenni, ur kecmen Loennet, skud ur iaadda ara ul$em di tii n tsegnit. Akka ay Nepqeiii ibe$wviyen
I nitni ameioee di Loahennama, ad $ummen s tmes. Akka ay Nepqeiii imednas
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan - ur Nepkellif i umdan siwa ayen iwumi izmer - widak, d at Loennet, nitni, degs, ad wekkoen

A Nekkes i d igwran n dd$el, deg idmaren nnsen. Isaffen ad ppazzalen ddawat sen. Ad inin: "ccekoan i Oebbi i $ Inhan $eo waya. Ur nepwanhu, lemmer ur a$ Inha ara Oebbi. Ni$ usan d imazanen n Mass nne$, s tidep". Ad pwanecden: "appan Loennet, tweotem p, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
At Loennet ad siwlen i at tmes: "ni$ nufa i $ Iaahed Mass nne$, s tidep. Ma tufam ayen i wen Iaahed Mass nnwen, s tidep"? A inin: "Ih". Iberree uberrae garasen: "xezzu n Oebbi i imednas
wid iiieooifen seg ubrid n Oebbi, ssaramen t d uawij, u nekoen laxeot
Garasen ssteo. £ef iqacucen, irgazen, ssnen ten akw, ar uuiffat nnsen. Ad siwlen i at Loennet: "tifrat fellawen"! Ur p keccmen, xas ssarmen
Mi zzint wallen nnsen ar at tmes, ad inin: "a Mass nne$! Ur a$ Ppara s agdud imednas
Ad siwlen at iqacucen i irgazen, ssnen ten ar uuiffat nnsen. Ad inin: "acu i wen d issuli wayen tjemaam akked wayen tzuxxem
Day wigi d wid i$ef teggulem, ar ur sen ippak Oebbi aeunu? "Kecmet Loennet, ur teppagwadem, ur t$weblem
At tmes ad siwlen i at Loennet: "smiret ed fellane$ aman, ne$ seg wayen is ikwen I$at Oebbi". Ad inin: "Oebbi, s tidep, Igdel iten i ijehliyen
wid irran ddin nnsen d zzhu, d urar, u t$uoo iten tmeddurt n ddunit". Ihi, assa, a ten Neppu, akken ppun timlilit n wass nnsen agi, u nekoen issekniyen nne£
Ni$ Nusa ten id s Tezmamt, Nfeuuel ip s tussna. D nnhaya, d aeunu i ugdud iumnen

Day la poaoun kan veoou s? Ass n tisin n veoou s, ad inin wid illan, iu$ leal, ppun p: "ni$ usan d imazanen n Mass nne$, s tidep. Day nesaa imcafaen ara $ icafaen, ne$ ad a$ rren, a nexdem ayen mgirrden wayen nxeddem"? Ni$ sxeuoen iman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen

S tidep, Mass nnwen d Oebbi. Ixelq ed tamurt akked igenwan di sdis wussan, sinna, Iaannec $ef usgeld. Ip$ummu iv s wass, ip$awalen $uoes. Iiij, aggur, akked yitran unzen i lameo iS. Day macci ineS lxelq akked lameo? D Asaadi Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Naaret Mass nnwen, s wannuz, di tbavnit. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid izegren tilas
Ur ssefsadet di tmurt deffir useeoet is. Naaoet eP, s tugwdi d usirem. Aeunu n Oebbi, s tidep, ar tama n lauuam

D Neppa id Ippaznen avu, d abecceo s ueunu S. Alamma, ma ibbub ed asigna aeayan, Nenheo it ar tmurt immuten. Nesse$li d syis aman. Nessuffe$ ed yissen yal ppemoa. Akka ay d Nessuffu$ lmeggtin, amendeo ma d tesmektim
Di tmurt laali, teff$en d im$an is, ma Irad Oebbi. Di tin icemten, teff$en d kan d iweqweqen. Akka ay Nepbeggin issekniyen i ugdud isnemmiren
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi war Neppa. Nek ugade$ fellawen aaaqeb, ass ameqwoaean
Nnan imvebboen n ugdud is: "$uone$, s tidep, aql ak di ttelfan n uuee
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ur illi dgi ttelfan. Maca nek d amazan s$uo Mass imavalen
Bbwi$ awen d tibratin n Mass iw, a kwen neuee$. Ssne$, s$uo Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Day twehmem mi kwen id iusa usmekti s$uo Mass nnwen, ibbwi t id urgaz segwen, iwakken a kwen inabi, iwakken a peezzbem, amar fellawen aeunu
Skaddben t. Nsellek it, akked wid illan yides, di lbabuo. Ne$meq wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Nitni, s tidep, d agdud ader$al
Ar Aad, gmat sen Hud. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Day ur tepeezziben ara
Nnan imvebboen, wid ijehlen seg ugdud is: "s tidep, $uone$, deg k tisselbi; $uone$, ih, kecc seg wid iskiddiben
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ur dgi tisselbi. Maca nek d amazan s$uo Mass imavalen
Bbwi$ awen d tibratin n Mass iw. Nek, i kunwi, d aneuuae muman

Day twehmem mi kwen id iusa usmekti s$uo Mass nnwen, ibbwi t id urgaz segwen, iwakken a kwen inabi. Mmektit ed mi kwen Irra d igensas, deffir ugdud n Nue. Isem$weo aias lqedd nnwen. Mmektit ed lxio n Oebbi, amar a prebeem
Nnan: "day a$ d tusiv, iwakken a naabed Oebbi Yiwen, a neoo ayen llan aabden imezwura nne$? Awi ya$ d ayen is la $ tessagwadev, ma d tidep ay tessawalev

Inna: "ni$ iwwet ikwen id ddell akked zzaaf s$uo Mass nnwen. Day ad iyi namren $ef ismawen i tefkam, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen, i wid iwumi ur d Issers Oebbi kra udabu. Ihi, gganit, nek yidwen seg wid ara igganin
Nsellek it, akked wid illan yides, s ueunu s$uone£. Nessenger wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, ur nelli d lmumnin

£uo Tamud, gmat sen Ualie. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi war Neppa. Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen s$uo Mass nnwen. Tal$wemt agi n Oebbi, d assekni i kunwi. Ooet ep a ppecc di tmurt n Oebbi. Ur p iiuoout, mulac a kwen ieaz uaaqeb aqeoean
Mmektit ed mi kwen Irra d igensas, deffir Aad. Isseqaad ikwen di tmurt, tepparram lebouj di swaeel, teqqazem ixxamen deg durar. Ihi, mmektit ed lxio n Oebbi, ur ssexsaoet tamurt, s usefsed
Imvebboen seg ugdud is, wid isme$awoen iman nnsen, nnan i wuohifen, wid segsen iumnen: "day teeoam ar UuUalie d amazan s$uo Mass is"? Nnan: "ih, numen s wayen is id ippuceggaa
Nnan imzuxiyen: "nekwni, s tidep, nenkeo ayen is tumnem
Eerrfen avao n tel$wemt, gelzen lameo n Mass nnsen. Nnan: "a Ualie, awi ya$ d ayen is la $ tessagwadev, ma d amazan ay telliv
Tewwet iten zzenzla, gwran d, deg ixxamen nnsen, d loeppat
Iwexxeo asen, u inna: "a yagdud iw! Ni$ ssawve$ awen d taboap n Mass iw, neuee$ kwen, maca ur teemmlem ara win ineueen
I Lui, mi inna i ugdud is: "day a txeddmem laao ur ixdim yiwen, uqbel nnwen, deg imavalen
Ih, kunwi tpeddum ar irgazen, tcehwam ten, war tilawin. Kunwi, ih, d agdud izegren tilas
Tiririt n ugdud is siwa nnan: "ssuff$et pen si temdint nnwen, nitni d imdanen issaramen tezdeg
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameiiut is, teqqim akked wid igwran
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur…Wali amek tevoa d ibe$wviyen

£uo Madian, gmat sen Cuaayeb. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi war Neppa. Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen s$uo Mass nnwen. Ktilet, weznet, s lewqama. Ur iiuoout medden di cci nnsen, ur ssefsadet di tmurt, deffir useeoet is. I kunwi yif it wayagi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ur p$imit di yal abrid, tessagwadem u tessefoa$em seg ubrid n Oebbi, wid iumnen yiS. Teb$am t d uawij. Mmektit ed mi tellam d takwemmict, Iketteo ikwen. Walit amek tevoa taggara ifessaden
Ma illa iumen urbaa segwen s wayen is id ppuceggaa$, arbaa nniven ur iumin ara. Ueboet ard Ieudd Oebbi garane$. Neppa Yif akw imeaddan
Nnan d imvebboen imzuxiyen, n ugdud is,: "a k nessuffe$ a Cuaayeb, kecc, akked wid iumnen yidek, si temdint nne$, ne$ a d tu$alev ar ddin nne$". Inna: "xas nugi

Ihi, nger ed tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ma nu$al ar ddin nnwen, mbaad ma Isellek a$ Oebbi, segs. Ur a$ ilaq ara a nu$al $uoes, siwa ma Irad Oebbi, Mass nne$. Mass nne$ Issemealleq i yal cci s tmusni. Nepkel $ef Oebbi". A Mass nne$! Fru p garane$ akked ugdud nne$, s tidep. Kecc Tifev akw wid iferrun
Nnan imvebboen, wid ijehlen, n ugdud is: "ma teddam d Cuaayeb, war ccekk a pxesoem
Tewwet iten zzenzla, gwran d, deg ixxamen nnsen, d loeppat
Wid iskaddben Cuaayeb, u$alen amzun ur zdi$en. Wid iskaddben Cuaayeb, d nitni ay d imexuuoen
Iwexxeo asen, u inna: "a yagdud iw! Ni$ ssawve$ awen d tiboatin n Mass iw, neuee$ kwen. Amek ara $weble$ $ef ugdud ijehliyen
Ur Nuzen ara nnbi ar temdint, mebla ma Newwet imezda$ is s cedda, akked lemveooa, amar ad eiwten
Sinna, Nerra ise$ deg umkan n tucmip, armi wexxoen, nnan: "ni$ jeooben imezwura nne$ lemveooa akked ttrika". Newwet iten deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Lemmer kan uminen u eezzben imezda$ n temdinin, war ccekk, ad asen Nelli lbaoakat seg igenni akked tmurt. Maca, skaddben. Nessemealleq asen, ilmend n wayen keppben
Day $ilen imezda$ n temdinin, ur ten id teppawev tiyta nne£, deg yiv, nitni iisen
Ne$ day $ilen imezda$ n temdinin, ur ten id teppawev tiyta nne£, deg wazal, nitni ppuraren
Day $ilen sellken i tandit n Oebbi? Siwa agdud i ixesoen, i i$ilen sellken i tandit n Oebbi
Ne$ day ur d Iban ara, i wid ara iweoten tamurt, deffir imezda$ is, ar, ma ihwa ya£, a ten Newwet $ef ibekkaven nnsen, a Nesle$ ulawen nnsen, d$a nitni ur sellen
D timdinin agi, i$ef ak Neekku, si tequivin nnsent. Ni$ usan $uosent imazanen nnsent, s ubeggen. Ur llint d tid ara iamnen deg wayen skaddbent uqbel. Akka i Iselle$ Oebbi ulawen ijehliyen
Ur Nufi nnesba ar tegwti nnsen. Nufa, tegwti nnsen, d iballa$en
Sinna, deffir sen, Nuzen ed Musa, s issekniyen nne£, ar Feraun akked imvebboen is. Densen ten. Wali amek tevoa d ifessaden
Inna Musa: "a Feraun! Nek d amazan s$uo Mass imavalen
D uuee, ur qqaoe$, $ef Oebbi, siwa tidep. Ih, usi$ kwen id, s ubeggen n Mass nnwen. Ihi, azen yidi At Isoail
Inna: "ma tusiv d s ussekni, zzi t id, ma tessawalav tidep
Iveggeo taakwazt is, appan d azrem n uuee
Issuffe$ ed afus is, iban ed d amellal i imnezhen
Nnan d imvebboen n ugdud n Feraun: "wagi, s tidep, d aseeear amusnaw
Ib$a a kwen issuffe$ si tmurt nnwen, d acu t lameo nnwen
Nnan: "anef as, neppa akked gma s. Azen iberraeen ar temdinin
ad ak d awin yal aseeear amusnaw
Usan d iseeearen n Feraun, nnan: "s tidep, ad a$ tkafiv, ma d nekwni ara i$elben
Inna: "ih, u, s tidep, a ppilim d iqoiben
Nnan: "a Musa! A pveggoev kecc, ne$ a nveggeo nekwni
Inna: "veggoet"! Mi veggoen, sdehcen allen n l$aci, ssagwden ten. Bbwin d sseur anect ilat
Nweeea i Musa: "veggeo taakwazt ik"! Apan tesseblaa ayen d uenaan
Tuao tidep, inqev wayen xeddmen
Akka ay pwa$elben. U$alen ar deffir, d unqisen
£lin iseeearen, knan
Nnan: "numen s Mass imavalen
Mass n Musa akked Haoun
Inna Feraun: "day tumnem yis, uqbel ma aammde$ awen? Ayagi, war ccekk, d tifxep. Tundim p di temdint, iwakken a ppessuff$em, segs, imezda$ is. Ihi, deqqal a ppeeoem
War ccekk, ad awen gezme$ afus ssya, avao ssya. Sinna, ih, a kwen semmoe$ akw $ef imudag
Nnan: "nekwni a nu$al ar Mass nne
Terriv d ppao segne$, imi kan numen s issekniyen n Mass nne$, mi $ d usan. A Mass nne$! Azen a$ d uubeo, Ddem leowae nne$ d imvuaen

Imvebboen n ugdud n Feraun, nnan: "day a ppeooev Musa akked ugdud is, ad ssefsaden di tmurt, a kwen ooen, kecc akked ioebbiten ik"? Inna: "a nene$ arrac nnsen, a nessider tilawin nnsen. Nekwni, sennig sen, d iqehhaoen
Inna Musa i ugdud is: "ppret afus n Oebbi, u ueboet. Tamurt, war ccekk, n Oebbi. A p iwoet win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Taggara i wid ipeezziben
Nnan: "njaf uqbel a $ d tasev, u deffir tisin ik". Inna: "amar Mass nnwen ad Ine$ acengu nnwen, a kwen Irr d igensas di tmurt, ad Iwali amek ara txedmem
Newwet, d$a, lois n Feraun s iseggwasen n llae, akked nneqs n ppemoa, amar a d mmektin
Ma iusa ten id ise$, ad inin: "nne$ wagi". Ma tusa ten id tucmip, a p sbibben i Musa akked wid illan yides. Ayen iveooun yidsen, day macci ar Oebbi kan? Maca, tegwti segsen ur ssinen
Nnan: " wicqa assekni ara d tawiv, ur a$ tepseeeirev yis. Nekwni, ur neppamen yisek
Nuzen asen aeemmal, ajoad, tilkin, imqweoqwoen, idammen, d issekniyen ifeulen. Sme$woen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi tevoa yidsen twa$it, qqaoen: "a Musa! Naao Mass ik i nekwni, s wayen i k Iaahed. Ma tekksev a$ tawa$it, a namen yisek, a nazen yidek At Isoail
Mi sen Nekkes tawa$it, ar lajel iten iggunin, atnan nitni xedaan
Nerra d segsen ppao, N$emq iten deg ill, imi skaddben issekniyen nne£, ur d celaen degsen
Nessewoet i ugdud i illan qehoen t, igmav akked ituram n tmurt, i Neoqa. Itam wawal uuam n Mass ik, $ef At Isoail, ilmend n wayen ueboen. Nhudd ayen iuennaa Feraun akked ugdud is, u wayen bennun
Nesaadda ill i At Isoail. Mmugren d agdud i iaabden tiaancuoin is. Nnan: "a Musa! Err ane$ oebbi am ioebbiten nnsen". Inna: "kunwi, s tidep, d agdud ur nessin
Wigi, s tidep, ad inger wayen ideg llan, ad inqev wayen xeddmen
Inna: "day awen budde$ oebbi, war Oebbi, u Neppa Ismenyaf ikwen $ef imavalen
Mi kwen Nsellek si lois n Feraun, sukken fellawen aaaqeb uqsie mavi; neqqen arrac nnwen, ssidiren tilawin nnwen. Deg waya, ajeooeb s$uo Mass nnwen ameqwoaean
Nemlal akked Musa kravet wavan, Nerna yasen mraw. Tebbwev tallit n Mass is, kuzet wavan. Inna Musa i gma s Haoun: "enuef iyi ar ugdud iw, exdem ayen ilhan, ur teddu d ubrid ifessaden

Mi d iusa Musa ar temlilit nne£, u Immeslay as Mass is, inna: "a Mass iw! Ssenaat iyi d, a K wali$". Inna d: "ur iyI tepwaliv, d awez$i, maca muqel s adrar. Ma iqqim deg umekkan is, ad iyI twaliv". Mi d Iusa Mass is s adrar, Irra t d saeel. I$li Musa, ixsef. Mi d iuki, inna: "gedha s yiseK! Utube$ K, nek d amezwaru n lmumnin
Inna: "a Musa! Aql I Smenyafe$ k $ef imdanen, i teboatin iW, i wawal iW. Ddem ayen i k d Fki$, ili seg wid isnemmiren
Nura yas, di tlewein, si yal cci, anabi akked ufeuuel n yal cci. Ddem itent s tezmert, ameo i ugdud ik a tent iiief s lmaana nnsent. Ad awen Ssekne$ tanezdu$t iballa$en

Ad Veoofe$, seg issekniyen iW, wid isme$woen iman nnsen di tmurt, war ssebba. Mi walan yal assekni, ur ppamnen yis. Ma walan abrid uuwib, ur teddun degs. Ma walan abrid n le$wlav, a t awin. Ayagi, acku, s tidep, skaddben issekniyen nne£, ur d celaen degsen
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, akked temlilit n laxeot, ur swin igiten nnsen. Day a ten kafin $ef wayen ur nelli d ayen xeddmen
Agdud n Musa, deffir es, isbedd, s ooeue is, aajmi bu loeppa isrugmuten. Day ur walan ara ar, s tidep, ur asen d ipmeslay, ur la ten inehhu s abrid? Aabden t, llan d imednas
Mi ppueeccmen, u walan ar, zi$ nnetlafen, nnan: "ma ur Ieun ara fella$ Mass nne$, ma ur a$ Isemmee ara, war ccekk, a nu$al seg imexsuoen

Mi d iu$al Musa ar ugdud is, s wurrif akked leemua, inna: "ay d ucmit wayen is iyi tneufem, deffir iw! Teb$am a d i$iwwel lameo n Mass nnwen"? Iveggeo tilewein, iiief gma s seg uqeoou, ijebt it id $uoes. Inna d: "a mmi s n yimma, s tidep, ieqeo iyi ugdud, qoib iyi n$an. Ur ssefoae icenga yissi. Ur iyi pparra seg ugdud imednas
Inna: "a Mass iw! Semmee ane$, nek akked gma, Ssekcem a$ ar ueunu K. Kecc, Tifev akw wid ipeunun
Ih, wid iaabden aaajmi, a d i$li fellasen wurrif n Mass nnsen, ad ndellen di tmeddurt n ddunit. Akka ay Nepqeiii wid id isnulfuyen
Wid ixedmen tucmitin, sinna, steooaen deffir sent, u umnen, Mass ik, s tidep, deffir sent, ar Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Mi irs wurrif is, iddem ed Musa tilewein. Di tira nnsent, nnhaya akked ueunu i wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen

Ifren ed Musa uatet irgazen seg ugdud is, ad mlilen yidne£. Mi ten tewwet zzenzla, inna: "a Mass iw! Lemmer i K ihwi, yili, iu$ leal, Ten$iv ten, u Tegliv yissi. Day ad a$ Temeuv, ilmend n wayen xedmen ije$lufen segne$? Wagi d ahewwel iK kan, Tettellifev syis win i K ihwan, Tnehhuv win i K ihwan. Kecc d Bab nne$, Semmee a$, Eun fella$, Kecc Tifev akw wid ipsemmieen

Aru ya$ ise$ di ddunit, di laxeot; aql a$ nu$al ed $uoeK". Inna d: "aaaqeb iW, a t Saaddi$ $ef win iyI ihwan. Aeunu W ijemmel yal cci. A t Aru$ i wid ipeezziben, ipzekkin, akked wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£

wid iteddun d Umazan, Nnbi ur ne$oi, i ufan iura $uosen di Tuoa akked Linoil". Iumeo asen d lqanun, Itekkes asen ayen n dir. Ieell asen laali, igdel asen dduni. Ikkes asen aruz akked lqid nnsen. Ihi, wid iumnen yis, i t iaawnen, i t isellken, iddan d tafat id irsen yides, widak d imerbae

Ini: "a yimdanen! Nek d Amazan n Oebbi $uowen meooa. Neppa, ineS tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Issidir, Ineqq". Ihi, amnet s Oebbi akked Umazan iS, Nnbi ur ne$oi, i iumnen s Oebbi akked wawal iS. Ddut yides, amar a ppepwanhum
Deg ugdud n Musa, arbaa iteddu s tidep. U syis ay peuddun

Nessemfaoaq iten $ef mrawsin laaoac, n leoyus. Mi s issuter ugdud is tissit, Nweeea i Musa: ewwet aeou s taakwaz ik. F$ent ed segs mrawsnat tliwa; akka, yal amdan ieoa anda ara issew. Nesbur iten s usigna, Nessers asen d lmenna akked ifeoouoen: "eccet seg wayen ilhan, is ikwen N$at". Ur a£ dnisen, maca la ddennisen iman nnsen
Mi pwanecden: "zed$et di temdint agi, eccet segs, ayen i wen ihwan, init: "laafu"! Aaddit di tebburt, s lekni. Ad awen Nsemmee tuccva nnwen. A Nernu i lauuam
Wid idensen segsen, neufen awalen s wid ur nelli d wid i sen nnan. Nuzen asen tiyta seg igenni, ilmend n wayen ddennisen
Steqsi ten $ef temdint i illan $ef rrif n yill, mi ur d rzin di ssebt, mi ten id usan iselman nnsen, walan ten, ass n ssebt. Ass, war ssebt, ur ten id ppasen. Akka ay ten Njeooeb, deg wayen ssexsaoen
Mi d inna lois, segsen: "iwumi la tepnabim agdud ara Isqucc Oebbi, ne$ ara Iaaqeb s leqsee"? Nnan: "d aste$feo ar Mass nnwen, amar ad eezzben
Mi ppun ayen i$ef pwafekkoen, Nsellek wid itekksen ayen n dir, Nesaadda aaaqeb adiran $ef imednas, ilmend n wayen ssexsaoen
Mi sme$woen iman nnsen $ef wayen i sen ipwakksen, Nenna yasen: "ilit d uddawen ucmiten
Mi Ixebbeo Mass ik, ard asen d Iazen ara ten iaaqben, s eeuo, alamma d ass n tnekra. Mass ik, s tidep, Ip$awal ar uaaqeb. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Nessemfaoaq iten di tmurt, d leoyus, garasen wid imaanen, garasen wid ur nemain. Njeooeb iten s ise$iyen akked tucmitin, amar a d u$alen s abrid

Neufen ten, deffir sen, ineuuafen i iweoten Tazmamt. Ppaddamen lerbae n ddunit, qqaoen: "ad a$ semmeen". Ma rnan usan ten id lerbae, am widen, a ten ddmen. Day ur aahden ara s Tezmamt, ard tidep kan, ara inin $ef Oebbi? U lemden i illan degs. Ppif axxam aneggaru, i wid ipeezziben. Day ur tfehmem ara
Wid iiifen di Tezmamt, ipeallan, s tidep, ur Nveggia arraz n lauuam
Mi Nessuli adrar sennig sen, amzun d tili, $ilen, s tidep, ara d i$li fellasen. Iifet nezzeh ayen i wen Nefka, smektit ed ayen illan degs, amar a peezzbem

Mi d Iddem Mass ik, si tgeeeal n tarwa n Adem, dderya nnsen, Inna yasen a d cehhden $ef yiman nnsen: "day ur Lli$ ara d Mass nnwen"? Nnan: "ih, ncehhed". Akka ur d teqqaoem ara, ass n tnekra: "s tidep, ayagi d ayen ur neeoi
Ne$ a d tinim: "d imezwura nne$ kan i icurken, zik. Nekwni d tarwa deffir sen. Day a$ Ten$ev, ilmend n wayen xedmen wid ioejjnen
Akka ay Nfeuuel issekniyen, amar a d u$alen s abrid
Eeku yasen d tadyant n win iwumi Nefka issekniyen nne£. Irra ten akin. Idda yides Cciian, iu$al seg wid i$eoqen

Lemmer i £ ihwi, Nessuli t yissen. Maca, ib$a tamurt, idda d lhawiyya s. Ihi, amedya s am win n waydi, ma teddiv p fellas, ad ilehhet, ma teooiv t, ad ilehhet. D wagi ay d amedya n ugdud i iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Eeku d tadyant, amar a d mmektin
Agdud iskaddben issekniyen nne£, d yir amedya. Pddennisen iman nnsen
Win Inha Oebbi, ihi, idda d ubrid. Wid Itlef Oebbi, nitni d imexsuoen

Ni$ Neswejd ed, i Loahennama, aias n leonun akked yimdanen. Saan ulawen, ur fehhmen yissen; saan allen, ur pwalin yissent; saan imeeeu$en, ur sellen yissen. Nitni am lmal, ne$ nnetlafen kteo. Wigi d i$wefliyen
I Oebbi, ismawen uuam. Naaoet eP, yissen. Veoofet seg wid issexsaoen ismawen iS. Ad ppuqeiiin $ef wayen xeddmen
Deg wayen Nexleq, yiwen n lois ivfeo tidep. Ipeuddu syis
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, a ten Nawi, cwii, cwii, ar wanda ur eoin
Ad asen Fke$ lmudda. Ih, ticeokep iW d tunuiet
Day ur d tepmeyyizem ara? Ur illi umeddakwel nnwen d aoehbani. Neppa, d aneddao kan ipbegginen
Day ur walan ara tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen Ixleq Oebbi n cci? Ni$, ahat, iqeob ed lajel nnsen. Anwa awal, deffir wagi, ar amnen
Win Itlef Oebbi, ur Isai nnahi. A ten Ioo ad hemlen di tjehli nnsen

A k steqsayen $ef yimir, melmi ara d yili. Ini: "i t Ieoan siwa Mass iw. D Neppa kan a t id Isseknen, di lweqt is. Ad iaeay di tmurt akked igenwan. Ur kwen id ippawev siwa deqzalla". A k steqsayen amzun tesaiv asali fellas. Ini: "i t Issnen siwa OOebbi", maca tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
Ini: "ur ksibe$ i iman iw, aba$uo ne$ vveoo, kkes ed ayen Irad Oebbi. Lemmer ssine$ tabavnit, ad owu$ lxio, ur iyi ipnal ixmio. Nek d aneddao kan, u d abcir, i ugdud iumnen

D Neppa ikwen id Ixelqen si yiwen n yiman. Iddem ed segs tameiiut is, ad izde$ yides. Mi insa yides, tebbwi tadist tafessast; telea yis. Mi d teubee eeayet, naaoen Oebbi: "a Mass nne$! Ma Tefkiv a$ d aaeovi, war ccekk, a nili seg wid isnemmiren
Mi sen d Ifka aaeodi, rran aS icriken s wayen i sen d Ifka. I aalay Oebbi, sennig wayen pcaraken
Day ad carken ayen ur nexliq acemma, u d nitni i ipwaxelqen
Ur zmiren a ten aiwnen, ne$ ad aiwnen iman nnsen
Ma tnecdem ten ar nnhaya, ur teddun yidwen. Iauva fellawen ma tnecdem ten, ne$ ma tessusmem
S tidep, wigi tnaaoem, war Oebbi, d imdanen am kunwi. Naaret pen, ma ad awen d rren, maday tessawalem tidep

Day saan ivaoen, ad leun fellasen, ne$ saan ifassen, ad ddmen yissen, ne$ saan allen, ad walin yisent, ne$ saan imeeeu$en, ad slen yissen. Ini: "naaret icriken nnwen, sinna, andit iyi. Ur iyi sganayet
Ih, Bab iw d Oebbi id Issersen Tazmamt, i Ieemmlen lauuam
Wid tnaaoem, war Neppa, ur zmiren a kwen aawnen, ne$ ad aawnen iman nnsen
Ma tnecdem ten ar nnhaya, ur sellen. A ten twaliv a k id pmuqulen, nitni ur pwalin
Ddem ayen ilhan, ameo ar lewqama, veooef i wid ur nessin
Ma ilaaj ik Cciian ar dduni, ppkel $ef Oebbi. Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ih, wid ipeezziben, ma innul iten urbaa n ccwaien, a d mmektin, d$a ad asen llint wallen
Zgan $elien atmaten nnsen, d$a nitni ur xevvun
Ma ur asen d tebbwiv ara assekni, ad ak inin: "acimi ur t id isnulfa ara"? Ini: "teddu$ kan d wayen iyi d ippuweeean, s$uo Mass iw". Wagi, s$uo Mass nnwen, d tafat, d nnhaya, d aeunu, i ugdud iumnen
Ma qqaoen Leqwoan ssemeesset as, ssusmet, amar fellawen aeunu
Mmekti d Mass ik, deg iman ik, s wannuz akked lxuf, s wawal irsen, tauebeit, tameddit. Ur ppili seg i$wefliyen
Ih, wid illan ar Mass ik, ur sme$woen ara iman nnsen, $ef uabad iS. Sbuccuaen T, i Neppa kennun
Steqsan k $ef rrbee. Ini: "rrbee i Oebbi akked Umazan. Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, elhut garawen, a$et awal i Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Lmumnin d wid kan iwumi ippergigi wul nnsen, ma Ipwabder ed Oebbi. Ma $oan asen issekniyen iS, ad innerni liman nnsen. £ef Mass nnsen, ay ppeklen
Wid ibedden i teallit, ipueooifen seg wayen is iten N$at
Wigi d uuee, d lmumnin. I nitni, ar Mass nnsen, tiseddaoin, ssmae, akked l$it uukyis
Akken ik id Issuffe$ Mass ik, seg uxxam ik, s tidep, wanag ur ib$i urbaa si lmumnin
La k pnamaren $ef tidep, deffir ubeggen is, amzun kan pwanehoen ar tmeppant, nitni peekkioen
Mi wen Iaahed Oebbi, ara ppili nnwen, yiwet si snat n trebbuyaa, tessarmem a ppili nnwen tin ur nepwasellee. Oebbi Ib$a a d itebbet tidep s wawalen iS, ad oeen wakali ijehliyen
A ppili tidep, ad inqev lbaiel, xas ugin ibe$wviyen
Mi tepprem afus s$uo Mass nnwen, Ijaweb awen d: "Nek ad awen Fke$ agim lmalayek, mestebaant
Irra t kan Oebbi d abecceo iwakken ad nnevmanen yis wulawen nnwen. Ur illi l$elb, siwa s$uo Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Mi kwen I$umm s yives, d iimana s$uoeS; Isse$li d fellawen aman seg igenni; a kwen Izzizdeg yissen, ad Issebaad, fellawen, a$way n Cciian, ad Isseohed ulawen nnwen, ad Itebbet, yissen, isurifen
Mi Iweeea Mass ik i lmalayek: "Nek yidkwent; tebbtemt wid iumnen. Ad Skecme$ tugdi deg ulawen n wid ijehlen. Ewwtemt sennig tmegrav, ewwtemt ar ixfawen ivudan
Ayagi, acku nitni, s tidep, xuumen Oebbi akked Umazan iS. I win ixuumen Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ihi, Oebbi Iwaao deg uaaqeb
Wagi i kunwi, jeoobet ep! U i ijehliyen, aaaqeb n tmes
A wid iumnen! Ma temmugrem d wid ijehlen la d eeddmen, ur sen reggwlet
Win i sen irewlen, assen, siwa ma la issewjad i umennu$, ne$ ma ikcem s arbaa, winna, a t immager wurrif n Oebbi; axxam is d Loahennama, a yir tu$alin
Ur ten tennu$em, maca d Oebbi iten Innu$en. Ur teooimev mi toeomev, maca Oebbi Iooem, iwakken ad Ijeooeb lmumnin s ujeooeb umain s$uoeS. Oebbi, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Akka, Ih, Oebbi Issadar ticeokep ijehliyen
Tessutrem l$elb, atan iusa kwen id. Ma tfukkem, ppif i kunwi. Ma tu$alem, a Nu$al. Ula iwumi tent, bippa, trebbuyaa nnwen, xas iiuqtent. Ih, Oebbi Idda d lmumnin
A wid iumnen! A$et awal i Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ur T ppaooat, u kunwi tsellem
Ur ppilit am wid innan: "nesla", nitni ur sellen
£eo Oebbi, s tidep, ineggura imexlaq d iaeeeugen, d igugam, ur nfehhem
Lemmer Ieoi Oebbi degsen lxio, yili Irra ten sellen. Ma Irra ten sellen, war ccekk, ad akwren avao, u nitni aauan
A wid iumnen! Jawbet i Oebbi akked Umazan, ma Inced ikwen ar wayen ikwen issidiren. Cfut ar Oebbi Ippili ger umdan akked wul is. £uoeS, Neppa, s tidep, ara tepwafessrem
Eezzbet i uhewwel. Ur ipeaz ara kan imednas segwen, weeeedsen. Cfut ar Oebbi Iqsee deg uaaqeb
Mmektit ed mi, kunwi, drus ay tellam, d uohifen di tmurt, teppagwadem a kwen xevfen medden. Iuueo ikwen, Isellek ikwen s l$elb iS, I$at ikwen s wayen ilhan, amender ma a ppesnemmrem
A wid iumnen! Ur pxeyyinet Oebbi akked Umazan, ur pxeyyinet lamanat nnwen, kunwi teeoam
Cfut ar, ayla nnwen akked tarwa nnwen, d ahewwel kan, u ar £uo Oebbi, ooaieb ameqwoaean
A wid iumnen! Ma teezzbem i Oebbi, ad awen Ifk afraz, ad awen Imeu tucmitin nnwen, ad awen Isemmee. Oebbi d Bab n lfevl ameqwoaean
Ma ppandin ak, wid ijehlen, iwakken a k eebsen, ne$ a k n$en, ne$ a k ssuff$en; ppandin u Oebbi Ippandi. Oebbi Yif akw imendayen
Ma $oan asen issekniyen nne£, ad inin: "ih, nesla. Ma ihwa ya$ a d nini am ayagi. Ayagi, s tidep, siwa d timucuha imezwura
Mi nnan: "a Oebbi, ma illa wagi d tidep s$uoeK, Sse$li d, fella$, id$a$en seg igenni, ne$ Awi a$ d aaaqeb aqeoean
Ur illi Oebbi d win ara ten Iaaqben, skud telliv garasen. Ur Illi Oebbi d win ara Ipaaqben ma nitni la suturen ssmae
Acimi ur ten Ipaaqab ara Oebbi, u nitni swexxioen si Loamaa n Leaoam, ur llin d imawlan is. Imawlan is, d wid kan ipeezziben. Maca, tegwti segsen ur eoin
Taeallit nnsen deg Uxxam, siwa aseffeo akked llir. Jeoobet aaaqeb, $ef wayen tjehhlem
Ih, wid ijehlen pueooifen ayla nnsen, iwakken ad veoofen seg ubrid n Oebbi. A t ueoofen, ad asen iu$al d lexsaoa. Sinna, ad ppu$elben. Wid ijehlen ad pwafessren di Loahennama
Iwakken ad Ifrez Oebbi dduni d laali, ad Irr ixabiten, wa $ef wa, a ten Izdi akw, a ten Irr ar Loahennama. Widak d imexsuoen
Ini i wid ijehlen: "ma fukken, ad awen Isemmee ayen iaaddan; ma u$alen, ihi, akken tevoa d imezwura
Nna$et pen alamma tfukk lfetna, u iu$al ddin s lekmal is, i Oebbi. Ma eebsen, Oebbi, s tidep, Ipwali ay xeddmen
Ma wexxoen, cfut ar Oebbi d Bab nnwen, Bab amxalef, Asellak amxalef

Akken ib$u yili wayen id t$eltem n cci, cfut amur wis smus n Oebbi akked Umazan iS, akked llzem, igujilen, ime$ban, win d ibbwi ubrid; ma illa tumnem s Oebbi akked wayen id Nessers i umdan nne£, ass n ufraz, ass ideg mlalent snat n trebbuyaa. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci

Mi tellam di loiha taqoibt, u nitni agwemmav, imnayen seddawat wen, xas temyefkem ppaaud, tzeglem timlilit. Maca, iwakken ad Isaaddi Oebbi lameo ara iaaddin, ad immet win immuten, s ubeggen, ad yidir win idren, s ubeggen. Oebbi, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Mi k ten id Issenaat Oebbi, d takwemmict, di targit ik ... Lemmer ik ten id Issenaat qwan, war ccekk, a pfeclem, a ppemnamarem $ef lameo. Maca, Oebbi Ijbeo ikwen. Ih, Neppa Issen i illan deg idmaren
Mi wen ten Issenaat, mi ten temmugrem, twalam ten d takwemmict. Ieeemei kwen ar tmu$li nnsen, iwakken ad Isaaddi Oebbi lameo ara iaaddin. Ar Oebbi ppu$alen lumuo
A wid iumnen! Ma temmugrem d arbaa, tebbtet, mmektit ed aias Oebbi, amar a prebeem
A$et awal i Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ur ppemnamaret. Mulac a pfeclem, a pnegfem. Ueboet! S tidep, Oebbi ar iueboiyen
Ur ppilit am wid id iff$en s tem$weo, seg ixxamen nnsen, iwakken a ten id walin medden. Swexxioen seg ubrid n Oebbi. Oebbi Izzi i wayen xeddmen

Mi sen icebbee Cciian igiten nnsen, u inna: "ur kwen i$elleb yiwen seg imdanen, ass agi. Nek d amalal nnwen". Mi mwalant snat trebbuyaa, iuker avao, inna: "nek xvi$ kwen, nek wala$ ayen ur twalam, nek ugade$ Oebbi. Oebbi Iqsee deg uaaqeb
Mi nnan ixabiten akked imehzulen n wul: "wigi, i$uoo iten ddin nnsen". Win ippeklen $ef Oebbi, ihi, Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Lemmer a pwaliv mara ddment lmalayek leowae n wid ijehlen, ad kkatent udmawen nnsen, izugar nnsen. "Jeoobet aaaqeb n tmeo$iwt
Ayagi ilmend n wayen d bbwin ifassen nnwen", u Oebbi ur pdennis imdanen
Am tikli n ugdud n Feraun akked wid i ten id izwaren. Nekoen issekniyen n Oebbi. Issemealeq asen Oebbi s ibekkaven nnsen. Ih, Oebbi d Uzmir, Iqsee deg uaaqeb
Akka, acku Oebbi ur Ipbeddil l$it is I$at agdud, alamma bedlen i illan deg iman nnsen. Oebbi Issel, d Amusnaw
Am tikli n ugdud n Feraun akked wid i ten id izwaren. Skaddben issekniyen n Mass nnsen. Nen$a ten s ibekkaven nnsen, Ne$meq agdud n Feraun; llan akw d imednas
£uo Oebbi, imexlaq ucmiten mavi, d wid ijehlen, d$a ur uminen
wid ukud tgiv lemaahda, sinna, di yal tikelt, neqven lemaahda nnsen, u nitni ur peezziben
Ma tugarev ten di ioad, sserwel yissen wid i ten id ivefoen, amar a d mmektin
Ma tugadev lexdaa seg ugdud, err iten akin, s tezdeg. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara ixeddaaen
Ur p$ilin menaan, wid ijehlen. Nitni, s tidep, ur zmiren

Heggit asen d ayen iwumi tzemrem n lemeella akked yimnayen, a ppessagwdem yissen acengu n Oebbi, acengu nnwen, akked wiyav, war segsen, ur tessinem; Oebbi Issen iten. Ayen tseddqem n cci, deg ubrid n Oebbi, ad awen d iu$al. Kunwi ur tepwadensem
Ma nudan talwit, nadi ep. Ppkel $ef Oebbi. Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma b$an a k xedaan, ihi, aammed $ef Oebbi, Neppa i k Ifkan afus s tallalt iS, akked lmumnin
Issemlal ulawen nnsen. Lemmer a pueofev i illan akw di tmurt, ur tessemliliv ulawen nnsen. Maca, Oebbi Issemlal iten. Neppa, s tidep, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
A Nnbi! Aammed $ef Oebbi, kecc, akked wid iddan yidek si lmumnin
A Nnbi! Eg leir i lmumnin, ad nna$en. Ma llan segwen warem iueboiyen, ad rnun snat twinas. Ma llan segwen twinas, ad rnun agim n wid ijehlen, acku, nitni d agdud ur nfehhem
Tura, Issafes Oebbi fellawen. Ieoa tella garawen rrehma. Ihi, ma llan segwen twinas iueboiyen, ad rnun snat twinas, ma llan segwen agim, ad rnun sin igima, ma Irad Oebbi. Oebbi ar iueboiyen
Ur issefk ara i Nnbi ad isau imeebas, alamma pwa$elben di tmurt. Teb$am tukci n ddunit. Oebbi Ib$a laxeot. Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Lemmer macci d ayen iuran s$uo Oebbi, izwar ed, yili a kwen iwwet uaaqeb abarar, ilmend n wayen tebbwim
Eccet ayen ilhan, ieellen, seg wayen i t$elltem, eezzbet i Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
A Nnbi! Ini i wid teiifem seg imeebas: "ma Iufa Oebbi lxio deg ulawen nnwen, ad awen Ifk ayen yifen ayen i wen ipwakksen, ad awen Isemmee. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ma b$an a k xedaan, ni$ iu$ leal xedaen Oebbi. D$a, Ikkes asen ooay. Oebbi Ieoa, d Bab n uuwab

Ih, wid iumnen, iunagen, ijuhden s wayla nnsen, akked yiman nnsen, deg ubrid n Oebbi, wid isnubgten u fkan afus, widak d imeddukwal bwaygarasen.
